0,"

It is my intent to teach yoga and offer nutrition consultations. My practice will be focused on offering a relationship based teaching style: individualized attention, individualized yoga routines, individualized diet and culinary consultations for people with a pay-as-you-can agreement. I will hopefully have a wide range of client relationships but will especially focus on marginalized individuals: the impoverished, those differently-abled, the aged, and the chronically ill will have access to personalized wellness consultations. I intend that my practice will be a form of seva, yoga in service to others
column2: my practice will not be a means of financial support for myself. I have a simple lifestyle and only modest means of self-support. As such I am asking for donations to pay for a yoga and nutrition consultant certificate.

column1: I am willing to offering sessions in return for donors' contributions. I am willing to discuss my goals and means with anyone. I aim to have financial transparency with any who ask.

I am lucky to have been informally invited to share in building a community based wellness clinic with other like minded practitioners. I am asking for a little help to get started on this as an expansion of my career path.

I thank you in advance for your time, consideration and support.

will benefit from better showers at lower costs and contribute to reducing plastic and water consumption. They will take care of themselves and respect nature more. These are people who are always looking for new organic remedies. What they all want is the good of their skin and mind.
Why limit yourself to a common shower experience?

column2: >About ten years ago, I woke up and went to have a shower like every morning before work. The weather outside was miserable, the sky was grey, it was cold and wet... and I thought, there must be a better way to start my day?  It was then I realised, I wanted to get more out of my morning shower.

>I dreamt of a shower which was able to mix directly in the water stream fragrances such as jasmine, yang-ylang or ancient and mystic smells of wood and sandal. I dreamt of a waterfall of emotions in which every drop on my body was a caress by nature and in which the aroma was interacting with my mood! In that instant, I was desiring a Moroccan hammam experience condensed in 5 minutes, in my ordinary shower, before going to work.
>My ambition was to re-think the idea of the ordinary shower in a more efficient and ecological way and to offer people like me an easy and affordable solution for their skincare regime.
>That's why I started my personal Shower Revolution.

>I am Luca Sanvittore, a 31 year old new entrepreneur with a background in sociology and psychology. I have always been interested in how smells can interact with a person's mood, memory and sense of well being. I love to improve the quality of my life daily and feeling healthy, while contributing to mindful consumption for a better planet, is important to me.

>To make this revolution begin, I had to bring together a team of experts in cosmetics, engineering and product design. After several hours, days, months and years of research and development, we brought to life a simple to use and easy solution based on a patented mixer SmileShower Shaker and specially designed capsules Pop&

column1: • Connect the SmileShower Shaker between your shower head and hose without any modification
• Once installed, 3 options can be easily selected via a rotating switch at the front of the Shaker allowing you to select:
- just water: reduces water consumption by 30% for each shower thanks to a patented internal system
- stop water: when stops are required it keeps your perfect water temperature and avoids water wastage
- mixed water: when you want to get the most out of your daily shower select mix - water blends with your choice of soaps, shampoo or essentials oils for 3-5 minutes via Pop&
1. Choose which skincare, haircare or therapeutic Pop&
column2: Go capsule is best for you

column3: Go' are special shower capsules which provide an excellent quality of cleaning whilst delivering pure organic body care and wellness products into your shower. Accurately designed to fit and to be mixed into the ShowerShaker, they are all made with natural ingredients and are eco-friendly as they require no plastic packaging.

column2: >The capsules are aromatic cleansers which mix a variety of essential oils, skin care and natural fragrances into your water stream for infinitive treatments as part of your every day routine.

>Cleanse, stimulate and invigorate after playing sports or relax and soothe your body after a long day. Our capsules allow you to choose your experience, whether you want to wind down or wake up, have a deep clean or freshen up.
>The water massage combined with essential oils cleans and moisturises your body at the water source, including those hard to reach back and feet areas, giving you an unbeatable cleansing sensation.

>ShoweRevolution is ideal for better circulation, improves skin tone and is efficient in keeping the whole body moisturised and complexion bright. The effectiveness of skin care depends on the delivery of ingredients deep into the skin. The skin is the most receptive when it is clean, moist and warm because pores and cells gaps are at their widest

column1:
The original, innovative, eco-friendly way to take better showers, at lower costs every day.

","ShoweRevolutionaries

will benefit from better showers at lower costs and contribute to reducing plastic and water consumption. They will take care of themselves and respect nature more. These are people who are always looking for new organic remedies. What they all want is the good of their skin and mind.
Why limit yourself to a common shower experience?

About ten years ago, I woke up and went to have a shower like every morning before work. The weather outside was miserable, the sky was grey, it was cold and wet... and I thought, there must be a better way to start my day?  It was then I realised, I wanted to get more out of my morning shower.

I dreamt of a shower which was able to mix directly in the water stream fragrances such as jasmine, yang-ylang or ancient and mystic smells of wood and sandal. I dreamt of a waterfall of emotions in which every drop on my body was a caress by nature and in which the aroma was interacting with my mood! In that instant, I was desiring a Moroccan hammam experience condensed in 5 minutes, in my ordinary shower, before going to work.
My ambition was to re-think the idea of the ordinary shower in a more efficient and ecological way and to offer people like me an easy and affordable solution for their skincare regime.
That's why I started my personal Shower Revolution.

I am Luca Sanvittore, a 31 year old new entrepreneur with a background in sociology and psychology. I have always been interested in how smells can interact with a person's mood, memory and sense of well being. I love to improve the quality of my life daily and feeling healthy, while contributing to mindful consumption for a better planet, is important to me.

To make this revolution begin, I had to bring together a team of experts in cosmetics, engineering and product design. After several hours, days, months and years of research and development, we brought to life a simple to use and easy solution based on a patented mixer SmileShower Shaker and specially designed capsules Pop&Go.
Connect the SmileShower Shaker between your shower head and hose without any modification
Once installed, 3 options can be easily selected via a rotating switch at the front of the Shaker allowing you to select:
- just water: reduces water consumption by 30% for each shower thanks to a patented internal system
- stop water: when stops are required it keeps your perfect water temperature and avoids water wastage
- mixed water: when you want to get the most out of your daily shower select mix - water blends with your choice of soaps, shampoo or essentials oils for 3-5 minutes via Pop&Go shower capsule
1. Choose which skincare, haircare or therapeutic Pop&Go capsule is best for you

Honed from traditional soap recipes, 'Pop&Go' are special shower capsules which provide an excellent quality of cleaning whilst delivering pure organic body care and wellness products into your shower. Accurately designed to fit and to be mixed into the ShowerShaker, they are all made with natural ingredients and are eco-friendly as they require no plastic packaging.
The capsules are aromatic cleansers which mix a variety of essential oils, skin care and natural fragrances into your water stream for infinitive treatments as part of your every day routine.

Cleanse, stimulate and invigorate after playing sports or relax and soothe your body after a long day. Our capsules allow you to choose your experience, whether you want to wind down or wake up, have a deep clean or freshen up.
The water massage combined with essential oils cleans and moisturises your body at the water source, including those hard to reach back and feet areas, giving you an unbeatable cleansing sensation.

ShoweRevolution is ideal for better circulation, improves skin tone and is efficient in keeping the whole body moisturised and complexion bright. The effectiveness of skin care depends on the delivery of ingredients deep into the skin. The skin is the most receptive when it is clean, moist and warm because pores and cells gaps are at their widest
column2: this is exactly the condition that a warm, steamy shower environment creates.

column1: In this context, the aromatherapy practice is applied in all its known modes via:
Protect blue skies and blue seas: every day you reset carbon emissions as you will not use any more plastic containers for your skin care products, whilst reducing foam by 50%
Protect your energy bills: you save up to 50%* of water for each shower and it's a money saver every time you use it
Travel the world with your shower: you can finally bring your favourite shower experience with you when travelling for business or pleasure
Create a different experience every day: customise your shower using hundreds of soaps and fragrance combinations
* The optimum shower experience using Pop&Go lasts up to five minutes
column2: within this frame of time you can get the most out of your shower whilst dramatically reducing water wastage.

column1: So far, the Team has invested in research and development, industrial processes and pilot tests. The product has been patented and is market-ready.
We now require funding to bring this revolutionary and eco-friendly solution to market.  Be part of the ShoweRevolution!

We believe that this product will revolutionise the way you think about your shower whilst contributing to a better planet. If you don't feel like contributing, just share the ShoweRevolution message with 3 friends... They might like it!
Want to know more? Take a look at our website ShoweRevolution.
The original, innovative, eco-friendly way to take better showers, at lower costs every day.",3.0,0,"1 Campaign

The Redhead Days

A wonderful and unique gathering takes place each year in the city of Breda, the Netherlands. Thousands of natural redheads from 80 different countries participate in a festival that makes them proud of their hair colour, helps them bond with other redheads and allows them to find recognition in each other's life stories. Attracting a growing global audience each year, the festival really makes a positive difference in people's lives. 

Help us continue to offer natural redheads the inexplicable sensation of being a part of this amazing Redhead Days festival!
column6:
>Who are we and what do we do?

We are a team of volunteers, some redheaded and some not, working in our spare time to organise the Redhead Days. We all have a huge passion for the festival, which gets fuelled by the wonderful feedback from our visitors. Each year, we make it our goal to trump the previous edition of the festival. So far, we've been able to reach that goal without fail and of that, we are very proud.

The problem with this goal is: we require more funds each consecutive year. With sponsors being difficult to find and with the festival growing as fast as it does, we find ourselves in need of other sources of funding. If we fail to acquire a big enough budget, the festival will have to be scaled down and it might even cease to exist altogether. This is why we come to you, to reach out and say:
column7:
>'We need your help to make this work. May we count on you?'


The Impact

We could write volumes about what makes the Redhead Days special, why it needs to grow and how it makes people feel. Aside from being an awesome celebration of red hair, a perfect reason for a party and a terrific way to make friends with people from all corners of the world, we feel this piece of art, made by one of our littlest visitors, sums up perfectly why the festival is so important:

Caitlin is just one of many redheads of all ages and walks of life to express feelings of gratitude, healing and pride after visiting the Redhead Days festival. Stories like this are why the event needs to continue growing. 


What We Need &
column8:
What You Get

We need to raise at least €15,000. Every last cent of the money we raise goes directly into the festival. We need it to organise activities and to pay for things like security, power supply, permits, decoration, et cetera. None of the organisers get paid for their efforts
column9:
100% of the proceeds are spent on the festival. 

We've lost a lot of money in the past, organising more than our budget could cover. If the festival is to survive, we need to be more strict about where the money goes. This funding thermometer shows you what we'll be doing with your money. We can only make an activity happen if we can fund it. By donating, you'll make the level rise and once we reach the goal for an activity, we'll organise it. So, you have the power to make things happen! And if we break the meter and raise more than our goal, that just means more and better activities and maybe a little nest-egg for next year!

The goals you can help us reach are:

column1: €5,000: Wonderland - We'll go all out and make sure the festival grounds are wonderfully decorated.
€7,500: Take a Load Off - This year, you'll be able to get a massage, beauty advice and get properly pampered.
€10,000: Picture Perfect - With your help, all individual photo shoots can go ahead as planned.
€12,500: Hugs ’n’ Kisses - Find friends or love with our new, social activities including speed dating.

€15,000: Time to Say Goodbye - For the first time, there'll be a closing ceremony and after party on Sunday so you can say goodbye to the friends you won't see until Redhead Days 2015!

In return, you will get some amazing perks. You can choose T-shirts, jewellery, VIP arrangements and much more. Whether you can spare €1 or €1.000, there's always something you can get. This image shows you some of perks you can choose. Click here to see the gallery, which shows more perks!
column6:
>Other Ways You Can Help

Don't worry if you can't afford to donate! There are other ways you can help:

column1: • Word of mouth: use Indiegogo's share tools to share this campaign with as many people as possible. Ask them to help you spread the word and encourage them to donate if they can.

• Become a volunteer! You can assist with one or more activities during the festival or join the organisation. To volunteer, contact bedrijfsbureau@redheaddays.nl and sign up! We also welcome new organisers with open arms.
• Do you have a blog? Please write about us! Tell your followers about the festival and the campaign so they might visit or donate.
• All media are welcomed to do a report on the festival or our campaign. If you need someone to interview or if you want more information, please contact info@redheaddays.nl.
• If you own a business or if you are a philanthropist, please consider sponsoring us. There are many ways we can accommodate you. For information, please contact bart@redheaddays.nl.
See you in Breda!

Hello!
My name is Dmitry, and I am developing a virtual personal assistant.

We all know Siri. And Cortana. And Google Now. They all are smart, but they lack something. A human-like personality. Ability to talk to you just for fun, like you do with your friends. Here is how she will look like:

You can give her any name, and talk to her using a mic. Compared to the early prototype, available at desktopfay.com, she will:

All items at her desktop are clickable. You can set up reminders, send and receive emails, and use a calculator. And of course email will support all modern network protocols.

Where your funds will go

I need the most valuable resource: Time. Without funding, I cannot dedicate my time to work on innovative projects. I also will spend the funds to buy:

  • A new PC

Desktop Fay will be distributed as a free-to-try software. Some functions will be free forever, and some will require a subscription. You, as an early contributor, will get a lifetime license, which allows using all Desktop Fay features without a subscription or time limit.

What the World will get

I always enjoyed making new things, which did not exist before. Things that are useful for many people. Imagine this cute, smart, and fun cartoon-like artificial entity. Doesn't she deserve to be created?

How else you can help
Spread the word. Make some noise about Desktop Fay campaign. The more people involved, the more chances we will make something interesting happen.

in dealing with contacts and contact information and wants to make your contact
also believes in creating a better society for all, therefore part of your
contribution will go towards making a difference to disadvantaged women in
Africa.  We have partnered with Capital Continuation Classes (https://www.facebook.com/capconclasses):
a school in Southern Africa, which provides opportunities to people who
did not previously attain their high school qualifications.  Disadvantaged
women from the school will be given the opportunity to learn about technology and some
of your contribution will go towards making their lives better by developing
their skills in the language of coding.
What We Need & What You Get
looking for funding for the third and final stage of the development of the
app, which will be available on both iOS and Android. We have developed the app
up to Private Beta testing stage and we require USD9,950 to get it to the
public beta testing stage and final development.

Because we value your input, we would like to give you the opportunity to Beta Test the app and make recommendations for us to consider. It is important to us that we provide our customers and/ or potential clients with a world class app that would make their contact management simpler, faster and easier.

Your contribution will also make a difference to some women's lives in our partnership program with Capital Continuation Classes in Botswana. The voice of women is still a murmur in technology and we believe that by raising awareness and educating more women about tech and coding we will begin to see a decrease in gender in balance.
only creating a solution to a problem that many face on a day-to-day basis
with contacts, but we are creating a better environment for all by producing a
product that prevents the killing of trees to print business cards. Our green
digital business card solution, is far more efficient and less costly than

We will, however aim to remain within our targeted timelines to get the desired product out to you and the globe as soon as possible.
word as much as you can and share the campaign using Indiegogo tools. The

column8: >Fossa di Lupo is an Extra Virgin Olive Oil from South East Sicily.

column1: Matthew and Marianna which are professional not related to the agriculture industry in any manner (Naval architect &
column2: Interior designer respectively), are aiming at producing a new range of their produce to celebrate the birth of Lavinia, our first child born in July.
column6:
>It is our wish to improve the outcome of our crop, since due to poor weather conditions this year, our total harvest is 75% less than 2013.

Your contributions will be invested to improve the crop for the 2015 harvest by introducing new composting techniques, careful irrigation, pruning, and general TLC during the Sicilian drought months from may to September......

column1:
Marianna and Matthew are relatively new to the Agriculture sector, having worked as an interior designer and as a naval architect respectively.

Marianna's passion for her land (Sicily) and her roots have led her together with Matthew to start up and develop the manufacturing and selling of Ultra Premium Extra Virgin Olive Oil into a business.

We have been at it since December 2012, having met a series of milestones over these 2 years:

column5: >P.D.O. Certification.  Demonstrating the quality and pureness of our produce,

>Bio/Organic certification:  We are two years into the compulsory 3 years required for Organic certification.  This process shall be complete by end of 2015, when we will officially have the Bio/Organic certification.

column1:
""Wolf Pit/Fossa di Lupo"" is an extra virgin olive oil obtained from the selection of the best olives from our grove located in the contrada 'Fossa di Lupo', this location is part of the P.D.O. Monti Iblei areas and in particular the subarea of 'Valle dell'Irminio'. The olives used produce an extraordinary P.D.O. Monti Iblei extra virgin olive oil.
The result is an exclusive and unique blend of extra virgin olive oil, which has a herbaceous fragrance and taste , oil of extreme high quality which can be defined, both by it's external looks as well as by the quality of it's contents as a sinphony of various sense notes which change as the oil moves along the throat.

We also produce a range of interesting fusions of extreme taste: Lemon, Cinnamon, Rosemary, Orange and Chilli. All our fusions enhance the flavors without covering the extra virgin taste, and they are a perfect combination for the dishes it accompanies (see above).


NOTES FROM FORTNUM&
column2:
MASON'S TASTING PANEL

""...the (WolfPit) ‘Sicilian Extra Virgin Oilve Oil’  scored very highly. The tasting panel commented ‘Hay and lemons on the aroma, sweet walnut flavours with crushed leaf bitterness and rolling mild heat- a very balanced oil.""


USEAGE

Our extra virgin olive oil is perfect to enhance the most delicious Sicilian dishes.
It goes well with raw and cooked vegetables, salads, soups, roasts and red meats.

whereas our fusions are perfect with.....



FURTHER INFORMATION

In ""Wolf Pit/Fossa di Lupo"" olive oil you will find the true and unmistakable flavour of the purest Sicilian extra virgin olive oil. Our oil is unique in it's flavour, quality and health properties, as well as traditional in its production through the cold pressing within hours of harvesting olives. These few teachings have been handed down and followed over the years, and together with the Sicilian climate , the fertile land and a great passion for the healthy , are essential ingredients to get obtain a unique extra virgin olive oil. 'Wolf Pit' oil is a product for real connoisseurs, unique in its kind due to the percentages of cultivars involved. Our policy is "" Elegance at the table, Luxury for the palate ."" For this reason our oil turns out a melody from both the quality of the oil as well as the luxurious design of the packaging. 


HOW WILL YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS BE USED.

It would be our intention to improve our range of extra virgin olive oil, through introducing new techniques to our olive grove.

column1: techniques we wish to improve/introduce include:
irrigation for the summer drought months
and expert pruning twice a year on half a grove at a time
and only should we exceed the Indiegogo target goal , we would also fund the following:
the US and Canada markets through sales investments
further top luxury markets/targets (Asia, Middle East)
bottles in pack of 5 gift luxury boxes
of 'Scents of Sicily' range of olive oils
of 'Scents of Italy' range of olive oils
of 'Scents of the Mediterranean' range of olive oils
Earn a 200ml of WolfPit Extra Virgin Olive Oil when you refer 5 purchases of '500ml of 2014 Olive Oil' or '2014 EVOO + Fusion'
• Earn a '2014 EVOO + Fusion' gift box when you refer 10 purchases of '500ml of 2014 Olive Oil' or '2014 EVOO + Fusion'
• Earn a 'WolfPit Full 2014 collection' Gift Box when you refer 25 purchases of '500ml of 2014 Olive Oil' or '2014 EVOO + Fusion'

• Then, visit this page on Indiegogo and look below the main video to share and copy your unique URL.

• Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the ""Link"" icon or begin sharing on social media by simply clicking the ""Facebook"" or ""Twitter"" buttons with your URL pre-loaded
When you click on any share tool on the campaign page, then you’ll automatically get a post or tweet that’s ready-to-go with your personal URL.
Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page
Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.

column8:
>OTHER WAYS YOU CAN GET INVOLVED.

Contributions are important but spreading the word about our product is another!  Please share with your friends, family and/or co-workers THIS page and our social media (see below)
And if you ever find yourself in Sicily enjoying our arts, music, food and culture - drop by and see us:

Fossa di Lupo (Spazio Sallemi),
Via Senia 117,
97019 Vittoria (RG),
Sicily,
ITALY,
Tel: +39 3341918583
email: info@fossadilupo.com


THANK YOU FOR ALL YOUR SUPPORT,
Marianna....

Short Summary

OK, I'm not a thermal engineer, but I play one on TV (no, actually, I am one).  After Typhoon Haiyan hit the Philippine city of Tacloban last Fall, images of U.S. helicopters loaded with bottled water soon followed.  After such natural disasters, water-borne diseases add insult to injury in areas struck by devastation.  And often, plenty of water is available nearby, especially in Hurricane-struck areas, but its seawater.  And the temporary loss of fresh-water supplies is not limited to the developing world.  As Hurricane Katrina showed, even developed nations can lose their fresh water supplies for days or weeks after catastrophe.

Anyone with a cooking pot, a source of firewood, and a source of any kind of water (even seawater and tainted water) can produce unlimited supplies of fresh drinking water with this light, inexpensive piece of plastic.  Imagine how many 'gallons' of fresh water those soldiers would be delivering if they had my 4.5 ft by 4.5 ft by 0.5 inch multi-laminate piece of plastic loaded by the hundreds in their helicopter instead.  They wouldn't even have to land, they could just toss this light piece of plastic out the window and let it float to the ground.

Unlike other fresh water producers, like filters or tablets, this plastic-sheeted desalinator will never run out or clog.  Inexpensive plastics capable of handling boiling water temperatures are much more common than most people realize, and a wire standoff will protect the assembled desalinators plastic parts from direct contact with the metal in the pot.
Please note this is currently not a solar desalinator, although that is one of the options to be studied if this is funded.

column2:
What You Get

Donations will be used toward the engineering and optimization of this item.  I need to research appropriate materials and construction methods, and optimize its thermal efficiency.  Research into its possible effectiveness as a solar desalinator of water will also be done.  Methods of mass-production will have to be accessed as well.

>If I can ensure this items performance, durability and inexpensive cost when mass-produced, then it can be produced and basically donated during or before natural disasters impact the fresh water supply.

column1: ""In God We Trust.  All Others pay cash.""  With successful development, future victims of natures fury will hopefully get their emergency desalinators for free. However, its gonna cost you $15.  Sorry.  That's about $5 for postage and $10 for materials and brilliance.  If that perk does nothing for you, just think of this little guy:

Also think of American soldiers hauling heavy loads of bottled water day after day into heavily impacted disaster zones filled with desperate and occasionally hostile victims.  This is a 'teach a man to fish' moment!
Think as well of your own disaster-preparedness.  Are you prepared if your source of fresh water gets shut off for days or weeks?

The Impact

Water is one of the most important human challenges and is likely to get worse in the near future, even without the specter of natural disasters.

• There are other ways of turning tainted fresh water into drinking water and some filtration devices are extremely low in cost.  These are already being used to produce fresh water in impacted areas.  However, the only reliable way to produce fresh water from seawater is through desalination.  While filters eventually clog, a single plastic-sheet desalinator can produce fresh water day after day for years.
  • I have a Masters degree in thermal engineering and two decades of experience. I'm qualified to research this item and work with other engineers and manufacturers to optimize its mass-production.

• Please spread the word to your family and friends.  The only certainties about natural disasters is that they are in our future, and they don't respect borders.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Hi there,

My name is Nicole and I need your help desperately. I have two extremely rare medical disorders. Following medical advice, I have endured heart surgery at 19, two bone surgeries at 30, a hysterectomy at 40, my stomach, pylori muscle removed and two hernia repairs on June 30, 2014. Tomorrow, I find out if my gallbladder needs removal. The results came back and my gallbladder was removed. I am still in the hospital after nine days. The list of tests is too long and horrible. During two of the tests, my heart stopped.  Currently, I am 43 years old and I am continuously attached to a feeding pump which provides nutrition and hydration through a port in my abdomen. It is NOT working. I cannot keep any weight on my body.
In my ""past"" life, I had a master's degree in special education. I was honored to receive Teacher of the Year for Every year I taught. One year, I even received Teacher of the Year for the entire county! I love teaching. It is a job I would do for free and I taught for over ten years. 
The doctors here in the USA do not have any more options for me. They have started talking ""life expectancy"" issues. I heard about a special program being offered in India in which they are having positive results...Cures!!! I started doing it and have done as much of the program as I can here. In just a matter of weeks, I have been able to start taking sips of water. The same doctors who were using statements like, ""if, when you pass, nursing homes, possible hospice..."" are now using terms like, ""when you were so sick, positive aura of health, FUTURE..."". If You help me, I will be able to finish this medical program. I will be able to have a life with my beloved husband. I will be able to serve my community as an educator. I will have a future. You can be an actual life-saver. I will never forget any of you.
The program begins in December. It is a miracle to be accepted at all so quickly. My husband and I have made all reservations with the hope that an angel will come through for us. Please be our angel. I live a life of service to others. It is what makes me happy. Once, I even gave away all of our possessions to a needier family. Now, I find myself in that position. I truly believe that the love we put out comes back to us.
I don't know how much more time I will have without this program. I do know that it will either cure me or teach me how to keep my body healthy. My faith in humanity is my driving force. I am maxing out every credit card, sold my car, selling jewelry...anything and everything to get there. We are acting as if we have the funds to do this. Please please please help me to get to India to receive the dire medical treatment I so desperately need. 
You are my last hope. I want to live. I want to love. I want to hike again. I want to work and volunteer. I need your help. Will you help me please?

Hello my name is Cindy Rabas and John Linden, above
column2: is a really good long time friend of mine.  He recently got diagnoised with Lou Gehrig's Disease.  He lost his job, he lost his driving rights and he has no insurance or help at all with medical bills etc.  He is staying with his girlfriend Marilee Loy, she is a saint
column3: however, can not handle him alone anymore, he has to go to a nursing home soon until they can find him an assisted living facility that is open to him coming there.

column1: He needs a wheelchair that is going to cost him $20,000 and all the medical bills as well. He has no insurance, lost his job and has hardly any motor skills or balance anymore. He needs help and I want to raise money for him. It is hard times for all but most people can complain and complain, but there is someone out there that ALWAYS has it worse then you!!! Please be generous

Well John's condition is deteriorateing now and he will be entering a nursing home for at least 90 days after the holidays...Any help would be appreciated. He will be in the Nursing home until they can get him into an assisted living place so he still needs help with medical bills and wheelchair as well

If he does not get the help, the bills keep piling up and up, he has nowhere to turn and can not find any help of any kind and stands the chance of being turned away from an assisted living facility also with no income!  His family stands to face turmoil also with having to clean all this up after he is gone.  If he has to stay in a nursing home he is young and this would just kill him earlier than the disease will!  He really needs the help and has no where to turn at all, please be generous in the donations please!!!

The $10,000.00 just will put a dent into the medical bills and help him get a wheelchair that will help him to be more independant!!!  His motor skills are deteriorating fast and the bills are building, he has NO WAY of paying these bills and needs the treatments to continue to help him...Please be supportive!  You will get gratification that you are helping an individual that believes in god and helps himself and other people out whenever he can...He has never thought of himself in the past ALWAYS has been there for other people to help out when needed, now is my chance to try to help him out in his time of need.

DIWO! -- 'Do It With Others' by asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. Can you help? We need your prayers and support. Would you please link this page to your Facebook account? Thank you so much!

DIWO! -- 'Do It With Others' by asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. Can you help? We need your prayers and support. Would you please link this page to your Facebook account? Thank you so much!",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns
Micheal Armstrong, our 14-year old son, brother, cousin, nephew and grandchild and most of all friend, is fighting Stage 4 Hodgkins Lymphoma.
We need to help his family pay for drugs, travel and accomodations while Michael is in treatment
Cancer drugs, travel and accommodation are expensive. We are raising funds to help cover costs such as
Travel to and from Sick Kids Hospital from Bowmanville, ON
Drug and prescription costs for Michael's treatment
Accommodations for Michael and his family while he is in treatment at Sick Kids.

Michael's Mom, Allyson, is off work while Michael battles this disease. With reduced incomes, even the smallest of expenses becomes a hurdle. And cancer comes with big bills. Michael needs his family around him. His family needs your help to be there.
Perhaps you just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
• Make some noise about your campaign. Share this link on your facebook page and with your friends.
• Come out to the benefit concert on Sunday July 8th and join in with our raffle, 50/50 draw and all the fun!

And that’s all there is to it.

My father, Tom Redd age 54, was diagnosed with stage III, liver cancer on Oct 15th, 2012.  We need to raise at least $10,000 to cover the cost of his medical expenses and medications. In addition, my mom will need to take time off from work during the last few months of my Dad's life, so they will need some money for living expenses (she cleans houses for a living, so she has no paid sick leave or vacation time.)  Lastly, because this is a terminal disease, there will be a need to cover funeral expenses.

Tom Redd is a loving father of two who has devoted his life to raising my sister and me. When he and my mother brought me into this world, they had nothing more than the clothes on their backs and a tiny roof over their heads. After having my sister my father knew he would need to support his new family. Starting from practically nothing, he built a concrete construction company that would, over the next 27 years support all of us.

Over the past three years, with the economy the worst its been in decades.  Work for my father has slowed to almost a halt, and his company and home are now in jeopardy of being taken. My parents have never had much money and no savings.

This situation has only worsened since his discovery of liver cancer. Since October he has been unable to work at all, and his condition has been increasingly getting worse. Without financial help, my father and all that he has worked for will die. My mother will be left with huge medical bills and will most likely have to sell the house and business. I could never explain through this, my love for my father and mother, and the pain I feel in watching my parents suffer after all they have given me. Having to watch as everything they own is being sold, has broken my heart and has barely covered a fraction of the medical cost already incurred. My father has never asked for any charity, and still would not, so it is my responsibility to help him and my mother through these tough times and ask what they can not.

Although my Dad has catastrophic health insurance, my parents cannot keep up with the costs of his end-of-life health care.  My father raised me to be honest and hardworking and regardless of what we raise I will fight till the end for my family. That’s why I am only asking for $10,000 in hopes that we can easily reach it. And maybe exceed it. Any thing raised will be a huge help, so no donation is too small.

My Father is only 54.  His 55th birthday is this week. This is my present to him, so please help us make his final days more comfortable.  Life is short and precious, any donation helps so please, help us in these difficult times.

Please see the incentives listed below.  I am a musician in Aspen, Colorado and will send you download of my band's original music for certain contributions.  In my 20's, I was a professional extreme skier.  For higher level donations, I will send you one of my videos.

Do you want to see Skunk2 make a come back in import drag racing by waxing Prayoonto and Cartel? Its been nearly 10 years, and they act like they've forgotten who their daddy is. It shouldn't be too hard to remind them. We had them covered by 0.2 secs the last time we raced and we would expect to do the same even after 10years.

We'd really like to do this, but from a time and resources standpoint, it would be hard to justify doing so.

But....we have decided, that if enthusiasts really want to see us race and are willing to help us bridge the gap in terms of resources, we will build a car and set a new record once again!

We thought it would be fun and interesting to try crowd funding to sponsor a race car. Certainly it will also be interesting experiment to see how serious our fans and haters actually are about seeing Skunk2 drag race again. It would be so cool to cover a race car with all the names of all our 'crowd sponsors' and loyal supporters!

We are looking to raise $50,000USD.
If we reach our fundraising goal then you have our guarantee that we will build a car and attempt to reclaim the records. We are offering various different donation levels that come with excellent perks.

If we decide not to proceed with building a car because we didn't raise enough funds, we will refund everyone's money! This is a zero risk proposition for our fans.

Hi! My name is Brenda. I am 63 years old and I've been

always healthy all my life. I had flu just once in a blue moon. Never been hospitalized nor had any surgery. I used to be full of life and happy as I can be, like in my picture above. Suddenly all went downhill!
Back in March of this year, one night I felt totally
different and I was having difficulties breathing. I right away called an
ambulance. They showed up in no time and transported me to the nearest hospital
which was only 10 minutes away. All I remember from that night being wheeled
through the hallways of the hospital and I passed out.  When I opened my eyes, I was lying on a hospital
bed, a close friend of mine was standing next to me. He said that I had a
massive heart attack, doctors saved me and I am going to be OK now. They were so much in panic, and lost hope
for me to survive, they almost attempted to get in touch with my daughter for
Later, I've been told that I was in coma
for 13 days. Every time doctors tried to bring me back, my heart was pounding at
200. A doctor later will describe  my heart as a race horse galloping.  And besides, my sugar levels went through the
roof at an unbelievable 800. I practically owe my life to live close to the
hospital, the quick response time of the ambulance and the wonderfully talented
team of doctors on calls that night and God of course.
To keep me alive, they had to use ""propofol"" (that is what ended Michael Jackson's life) to
hold me in induced-coma until my heart responds in a better way and in the
meantime they didn't want to perform an open heart surgery because of my
weak condition and placed a double metal stent next to eachother in one of my arteries as a viable
solution at that moment. I still have
another artery blocked in a way that it is not an immediate threat for now. That gives me enough warning that I have to be careful and stay in alert for future complications.
During my stay in the hospital, I couldn't walk at the beginning and it
was very hard to even stand up. Also while having my heart attack, in the ICU,
they had to pull my few teeth supporting my partial dentures, to create the
easy access for all tubing and gadgets they have inserted through my throat.
All this time I was still hallucinating
under the propofol influence (it’s common to last over a year) they have
administrated. Besides all I started to have a reaction as non-stop hiccups at
the hospital and the reasons cannot be identified. Just imagine yourself hiccuping
non-stop 24 hours a day. I couldn't
sleep, had hard time eating and drinking the little I can. Hiccups lasted over
2 weeks and suddenly disappeared as they started. Still no one knows what
triggered. Once I went home to continue recovering, I was able to walk with a
walker and my hands were shaking really badly. I needed both hands to hold a
cup and it was really tricky even to use a spoon. It took over 3 months to get
less symptomatic and back to a decent level of health.  I am still really careful driving, no further
than couple of miles, just for grocery shopping.
I used to earn my living as a free-lance web site and
graphic designer which requires advanced computer skills and great mental
creativity and I was really good at it, as I was told. I couldn't perform my assignments because of
my shaking hand, trembling fingers, and couldn't even put together my thoughts and concentrate due to the medications
administered during my coma.  In result, I've
lost many web site maintenance contracts that I had, some customers thought that I was
dying and they simply cancelled. Therefore my income dropped drastically.
Finally I am able to start working with my computers in a
slower pace than I used to. At least I did start to create an income.
As of now I am creating enough income to barely pay my rent
and amenities and food. I am on 8 different important medications that I am
having really hard time to pay for (no insurance).
All I am asking for a little help, a little push to keep me
floating until I catch up or at least come close to the income I used to make. I am
predicting that I will reach a better level of income within 6 to 8 months,
Now that I don't have any teeth and no dentures (partial
ones are useless when there is nothing to anchor), I need a full set of denture
to look decent to meet potential customers for new
assignments, not to mention even go out in public,
The amount of $2300 that I am asking will be allocated to
- 6 months of medication (3 different ones for my
type 2 diabetes, 5 heart related ones which I have to take for the rest of my
life). $600 is estimated to support to cover what I cannot come up with. Their actual cost is way more than that.
- Full set of dentures so I can look presentable in the
meetings etc. $1400 is just enough for low end ones.
- 2 specialist doctors’ visits  for the next 6 months, $169 each. I don't have
As I mentioned I managed to start earning an income of few dollars monthly so far, but I need a
short term support to come closer to my potential. I think God gave me another
chance to live and with your kind support, I will be able to be around
longtime. This girl needs a heartfelt boost to be herself again.

your help to help us to save lives by detecting Cancer and other diseases at
crucial early stages with our ground breaking technology.
help us to raise $750,000 to bring this ground breaking detection device to the
next stage where it can be tested in health trials to identify very early stage
Cancer as well as other diseases such as Tuberculosis before they manifest into
3 people predicted to be diagnosed with Cancer, the impact of this technology
could be massive: by identifying diseases before they start, thousands of lives
could be saved every year and at a fraction of the cost of current methods.
Commercial and Marketing Director, Wesley Baker says “We
believe that breath analysis is the “holy grail” of medical
diagnosis because it is inexpensive, simple to use and allows early stage
identification which greatly increases quality of life and a patient’s chances
of survival.  If we could get individuals to donate just $10 we would be
well on our way towards saving lives, that could well be your family, friends,
and even associates with a device that can detect cancer early – this is our
driving force, we must get this device to the world as soon as possible!”

renowned expert in nucleation/condensation technology with more than 150

column2: D publications and patents, has been leading a research team to

mixture of molecules produced by body fluids called “biomarkers” which can be

company’s long term goal is to get the device into local doctor’s offices,
Baker stresses that <b><i>“Cancer touches all of us eventually – it could be
you or someone you know and/or love!  Donations will be put towards the
development of this groundbreaking device so that it can save uncountable lives
from the perils of this ugly disease.”
help us, we want to bring this technology to the world as cheaply and cost
effectively as possible to provide everyone with a chance of beating disease.

I can not stress this enough Ancon Technology provides a ""revolutionary breakthrough technology platform"" that is based upon a fundamental discovery of new way of physical magnification of a single molecule. It is not possible to detect less than this!!!! it is the highest sensitivity that can be achieved - a single molecule!

PRODUCT TECHNOLOGY:

Exhaled breath contains a complex mixture of various molecules and importantly specific molecules produced by body fluids in various body compartments or emitted by bacteria - so called biomarkers. The biomarkers are unique signatures of diseases and conditions, e.g. lung cancer cells emit certain specific biomarkers. These biomarkers can be used as an indication of diseases and conditions.

The reliability of breath detection has been proven in direct tests against CT scans and other diagnostic techniques as reference method for early detection of lung cancer in multiple lung cancer screening trials.

Nanoparticle Biomarker Tagging (NBT) is a breakthrough detection technology that offers unprecedented sensitivity and selectivity that is sufficient to identify and quantify lung cancer biomarkers in the exhaled air even at the earliest stage when the number of biomarkers present is billions of times less than the number of air molecules. Our NBT technology is far superior to all current technologies for trace compound quantification in the air.

Example of lung cancer diagnostic using Butylated hydroxytoluene measured in the breath of a patient as the biomarker of lung cancer. Butylated hydroxytoluene is a lung cancer biomarker molecule.  The presence of this biomarker in exhaled breath can be detected by NBT technology for the diagnosis of lung cancer in a test taking only a few minutes...

DETECTION OF CANCER:

The goal of screening examinations for early cancer detection is to find cancers before they start to cause symptoms. Screening refers to tests and exams used to find a disease, such as cancer, in people who do not have any symptoms. Early detection means using an approach that lets breast cancer get diagnosed earlier than otherwise might have occurred.

Cancers that are found because they are causing symptoms tend to be larger and are more likely to have already spread, for example stage 3 and 4 of the lung cancer. In contrast, cancers found during screening examinations are more likely to be smaller and still confined to a localised area and minimal in size.

Most doctors feel that early detection tests for cancer would without doubt save thousands of lives each year. Early detection of cancer greatly increases the chances for successful treatment. There are two major components of early detection of cancer: education to promote early diagnosis and screening.

Ancon Technologies are looking to take detection of cancers to the forefront of medical care, and this will enable a simple breath test to identify cancer, and in doing so will enable instant treatment options before the cancer can progress.

Our device is known as an NBT detector and is a portable laboratory in a desktop enclosure comprising several stages of manipulation of biomarkers on a molecular level that enables unprecedented performance. The ground-breaking sensitivity of NBT technology is based on physical amplification of a biomarker molecule to sizes visible or easily detectable by an inexpensive laser counter. The degree of amplification is more than 1 billion times in mass.
OUR TEAM TO FIGHT CANCER:

Boris Gorbunov
Dr Boris Gorbunov has more than 25 years’ experience as a leading scientist in condensation technology (basis for the physical amplification), nanoparticle-separation, characterization, nano-object (tags) generation and -instrument development. He is an internationally renowned expert in nucleation/condensation technology with more than 150 technical R&
column2: D publications and patents. Boris is also a visiting professor to Kent University.

column1:
Robert Muir
Dr R B Muir has wide ranging skills and experience in Aerosols Nanotechnology Particles. Dr Muir has been a senior manager for over 20 years, principally with Shell, he has had responsibilities for global businesses with billion$ revenues. Deep expertise in developing and building new businesses within large corporate environments and with start-up and spin-off companies.

Wesley Baker
Wesley is well-respected in the business community, having held senior managerial board positions within large international corporations. He has successfully launched a number of start-up businesses in a range of industry’s over two and half decades including manufacturing, tourism, software, distribution, consultancy, space technology and aviation. He has been published worldwide within articles both in his own name and his alias. Wesley is very passionate about early detection of Cancer and other illnesses.

Jason Reece
Jason is a chartered engineer with over 25 years engineering experience and over 13 years technical directorship. He has innovative, patented and published designs at the forefront of science and medicine collaboration with significant academic and commercial suppliers. Strong practical technical background in medical device and scientific instrumentation with proven technical management skills he brings a wealth of experience to the business within the engineering field that is vital to the successful deployment and engineering of the Ancon product.

Jane Baker
Jane is an accomplished management accountant and company administrator and worked for over decade for Prince Charles business trust “business in the community” she has also been a financial director and controlled large budgets and filing all financial reports. A graduate from Buckinghamshire University in Business Management she offers an ability to support the senior management of the company with clear unrivalled vision.

Brian Steer   
Brian is a young competitive and very ambitious physicist graduated from The Trinity College Dublin. He is the leading developer in designing highly selective equipment enables to select biomarkers for lung cancer and other diseases. In 2012 his work won Winter Innovation Award by The Institute of Physics UK - a high achievement of excellence.

Michael Burton
Michael is a young scientist from Kent University who is the project leader dedicated to integration of Ancon highly sensitive detector with ion selector. He was responsible for proof of principle of diagnostics of the lung cancer and tuberculosis using Ancon technology. Recently he took part in work with Boulby Underground Scientific facility (Dark Matter Laboratory) where unprecedented sensitivity of Ancon technology was confirmed.

Please help us, we want to bring this technology to the world as cheaply and cost effectively as possible to provide everyone with a chance of beating disease. I can not stress this enough Ancon Technology provides a ""revolutionary breakthrough technology platform"" that is based upon a fundamental discovery of new way of physical magnification of a single molecule. It is not possible to detect less than this!!!! it is the highest sensitivity that can be achieved - a single molecule!

It is not possible to detect less than this!!!! it is the highest sensitivity that can be achieved - a single molecule!

PRODUCT TECHNOLOGY:Exhaled breath contains a complex mixture of various molecules and importantly specific molecules produced by body fluids in various body compartments or emitted by bacteria - so called biomarkers. The biomarkers are unique signatures of diseases and conditions, e.g. lung cancer cells emit certain specific biomarkers. These biomarkers can be used as an indication of diseases and conditions. The reliability of breath detection has been proven in direct tests against CT scans and other diagnostic techniques as reference method for early detection of lung cancer in multiple lung cancer screening trials. Nanoparticle Biomarker Tagging (NBT) is a breakthrough detection technology that offers unprecedented sensitivity and selectivity that is sufficient to identify and quantify lung cancer biomarkers in the exhaled air even at the earliest stage when the number of biomarkers present is billions of times less than the number of air molecules. Our NBT technology is far superior to all current technologies for trace compound quantification in the air. Example of lung cancer diagnostic using Butylated hydroxytoluene measured in the breath of a patient as the biomarker of lung cancer. Butylated hydroxytoluene is a lung cancer biomarker molecule.  The presence of this biomarker in exhaled breath can be detected by NBT technology for the diagnosis of lung cancer in a test taking only a few minutes...

DETECTION OF CANCER:The goal of screening examinations for early cancer detection is to find cancers before they start to cause symptoms. Screening refers to tests and exams used to find a disease, such as cancer, in people who do not have any symptoms. Early detection means using an approach that lets breast cancer get diagnosed earlier than otherwise might have occurred.Cancers that are found because they are causing symptoms tend to be larger and are more likely to have already spread, for example stage 3 and 4 of the lung cancer. In contrast, cancers found during screening examinations are more likely to be smaller and still confined to a localised area and minimal in size.Most doctors feel that early detection tests for cancer would without doubt save thousands of lives each year. Early detection of cancer greatly increases the chances for successful treatment. There are two major components of early detection of cancer: education to promote early diagnosis and screening.Ancon Technologies are looking to take detection of cancers to the forefront of medical care, and this will enable a simple breath test to identify cancer, and in doing so will enable instant treatment options before the cancer can progress.

Our device is known as an NBT detector and is a portable laboratory in a desktop enclosure comprising several stages of manipulation of biomarkers on a molecular level that enables unprecedented performance. The ground-breaking sensitivity of NBT technology is based on physical amplification of a biomarker molecule to sizes visible or easily detectable by an inexpensive laser counter. The degree of amplification is more than 1 billion times in mass.

Boris Gorbunov Dr Boris Gorbunov has more than 25 years’ experience as a leading scientist in condensation technology (basis for the physical amplification), nanoparticle-separation, characterization, nano-object (tags) generation and -instrument development. He is an internationally renowned expert in nucleation/condensation technology with more than 150 technical R&D publications and patents. Boris is also a visiting professor to Kent University.

Robert Muir Dr R B Muir has wide ranging skills and experience in Aerosols Nanotechnology Particles. Dr Muir has been a senior manager for over 20 years, principally with Shell, he has had responsibilities for global businesses with billion$ revenues. Deep expertise in developing and building new businesses within large corporate environments and with start-up and spin-off companies.

Wesley Baker Wesley is well-respected in the business community, having held senior managerial board positions within large international corporations. He has successfully launched a number of start-up businesses in a range of industry’s over two and half decades including manufacturing, tourism, software, distribution, consultancy, space technology and aviation. He has been published worldwide within articles both in his own name and his alias. Wesley is very passionate about early detection of Cancer and other illnesses.

Jason Reece Jason is a chartered engineer with over 25 years engineering experience and over 13 years technical directorship. He has innovative, patented and published designs at the forefront of science and medicine collaboration with significant academic and commercial suppliers. Strong practical technical background in medical device and scientific instrumentation with proven technical management skills he brings a wealth of experience to the business within the engineering field that is vital to the successful deployment and engineering of the Ancon product.

Jane BakerJane is an accomplished management accountant and company administrator and worked for over decade for Prince Charles business trust “business in the community” she has also been a financial director and controlled large budgets and filing all financial reports. A graduate from Buckinghamshire University in Business Management she offers an ability to support the senior management of the company with clear unrivalled vision.

Brian Steer   Brian is a young competitive and very ambitious physicist graduated from The Trinity College Dublin. He is the leading developer in designing highly selective equipment enables to select biomarkers for lung cancer and other diseases. In 2012 his work won Winter Innovation Award by The Institute of Physics UK - a high achievement of excellence.

Michael BurtonMichael is a young scientist from Kent University who is the project leader dedicated to integration of Ancon highly sensitive detector with ion selector. He was responsible for proof of principle of diagnostics of the lung cancer and tuberculosis using Ancon technology. Recently he took part in work with Boulby Underground Scientific facility (Dark Matter Laboratory) where unprecedented sensitivity of Ancon technology was confirmed.Please help us, we want to bring this technology to the world as cheaply and cost effectively as possible to provide everyone with a chance of beating disease. I can not stress this enough Ancon Technology provides a ""revolutionary breakthrough technology platform"" that is based upon a fundamental discovery of new way of physical magnification of a single molecule. It is not possible to detect less than this!!!! it is the highest sensitivity that can be achieved - a single molecule!",12.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: Meaning In Words (MIW, pronounced 'me-you') explores the nature of connections.
On a personal level, with two description of each other (me and you) MIW can identify how we may relate to each other.
With direction it can identify strengths and weaknesses in our connections.
On a cultural level, it can help us
explore meaning in words and ideas. Through use of language, MIW may assist us to understand something about human nature.
MIW is an engine that understands the meaning of words through their connections to other words.
Through word association, MIW enriches text and quantifies it for analysis.
MIW comes with a range of applications:

column2: >Explore words and their relationships. Use it for education, art, poetry, writing songs, whatever you want...
>Describe a situation. And observe possible emotions that may arise.
>Two humans give their description of the same situation. MIW shows which emotions might be experienced by each human. MIW helps to identify emotional disconnects, and suggests emotional bridging.
>Achieve literary harmony by identifying and modifying words that make undesired associations.(User is required to specify what is undesirable)
>A set of tools to assist statistical analysis of text in academic research.
>A set of tools for exploring abstract ideas and themes.
>I look forward to hearing your ideas and suggestions.

>

My attempt to map out components of existence. I'm sure you will do better ones.

column1: I ask that you raise awareness. Let your friends know about this project. Discuss amongst yourselves the benefits this project can bring to your organization,
Share your results with your friends. Spark conversations on your findings.
I would like this project to reflect its users as much as its designer.
I would like you to use it, and give feedback for future enhancement.
At this stage I want to make this service available to the public. I need money to hire help to test and enhance the user interface. I also need to buy equipment to power the data processing.
The $32,817.20 of your funding will be used to enhance the usability of this engine. This includes the graphical tools, website and documentation.
It will also be used to add compatibility with other browsers and mobile devices. Details on budgetting and progress is available
I can respect donors who wish to be anonymous. Your pledge is much appreciate, and

All funders will be invited and granted access to tour the system, and enjoy shared results. You can be the first to try this new technology. For personalized analysis limited PlayTime is granted with each donation.
Success is powered by people. It is crowds that give a future to ideas. In return these ideas blossom and benefit the crowd.

MIW wants to give a hand in keeping the wheel turning smoothly. It will use his future profits to fund a crowd funding initiative of your choice, in your name (called GiveBack). MIW pledges to payback as soon as possible.

column5: />My name is Reza Amini. I graduated from University of Waterloo's Computer Engineering program in 2004. After working in the high-tech sector

column1: I pursued my desire to understand the human brain at University of Ottawa. I graduated from their Psychology program in 2009, and received a master's degree in Experimental
Psychology in 2011. My research focused on degrees of emotional tone in dream reports.
I used theories and scientific understanding of the human biology to model human memory. I called it Word Association to reflect it's nature.
Soon I found that this method could be used to analyze text on a semantic level that could benefit my colleagues.
From 2011 to the present, I have dedicated myself and my resources in making this tool available to the public. In the process I have discovered that this tool could
have uses outside academia. The thought of reaching out to people such as yourself has given me an energy boost. And here I am.
Meaning In Words Data Analysis Canada Inc., is a start-up company
Meaning In Words (MIW, pronounced 'me-you') explores the nature of connections.
On a personal level, with two description of each other (me and you) MIW can identify how we may relate to each other.
With direction it can identify strengths and weaknesses in our connections.
On a cultural level, it can help us
explore meaning in words and ideas. Through use of language, MIW may assist us to understand something about human nature.
MIW is an engine that understands the meaning of words through their connections to other words.
Through word association, MIW enriches text and quantifies it for analysis.
meaning of words through their definitions
meaning of ideas through their descriptions
MIW comes with a range of applications:
Explore words and their relationships. Use it for education, art, poetry, writing songs, whatever you want...
Describe a situation. And observe possible emotions that may arise.
Two humans give their description of the same situation. MIW shows which emotions might be experienced by each human. MIW helps to identify emotional disconnects, and suggests emotional bridging.
Achieve literary harmony by identifying and modifying words that make undesired associations.(User is required to specify what is undesirable)
A set of tools to assist statistical analysis of text in academic research.
A set of tools for exploring abstract ideas and themes.
I look forward to hearing your ideas and suggestions.
My attempt to map out components of existence. I'm sure you will do better ones.

For those of you who haven't heard about ""Batkivschyna-2"" it a two mast tall ship built by a group of enthusiasts in Kyiv, Ukraine. It’s made of cement and steel. That's right - CEMENT!!! For common people it seems unusual, but in fact its a very durable and strong material called ferrocement. And no, it wont sink! =) It's been used in boatbuilding for many years. In 1973 ferro yacht “Helsal” won the Sydney to Hobart yacht race.

Few years ago we did a crowdfunding campaign, but when it comes to building a tall-ship you never deny extra financial help.

Now we are soooooo close to launching “Batkivschyna-2” in the water as ever! It’s 90% done and almost ready for launching. All what it needs is an ENGINE! That why we turned to crowdfunding.

After searching for an appropriate engine we came to conclusion that the best choice would be a marine diesel engine “TDME-4108”, 90 hp., 2500 rpm/min.

It costs 9000 $ US.

Please, help us make it happen!

Hello, my name is Arnaldo Velasco, and I am raising funds to help my son play soccer. My son, Jonathan, is incredibly passionate about soccer, and after trying out for a very elite team, he made the cut! The only issue is that is costs around $2,000 a year for him to play on the team, so I am asking for help to fulfill my sons dream. Thank you to everyone that helps my son, you have no idea what any contribution (large or small) means to him, his mother, and I.

One of our Hungarian Shetlanders Needs Help.
Anett Gyenge (33) and Gergely Barta (32) made Shetland their
home in 2012. You may have been served by Anett, recognised by her striking red
hair, she is a waitress and barmaid at the Shetland and Lerwick Hotel. For the
last few years Gergely, known as Gery, has worked at the Scalloway Meat Company
shop and more recently also at the Thule Bar.
Anett and Gery were traveling to Hungary on holiday and
broke their journey in Stuttgart Germany. They decided to do some
sightseeing and while they were touring a church it started to rain. Anett
slipped on wet cobbled steps outside the church and hit her head badly. She had
to be airlifted to Ludwigsburg hospital where she was put into an induced coma
for 2 weeks, the doctors performed a laryngectomy to help her breath and
Anett and Gery did not have travel insurance,
only the blue, National Insurance issued, EU health insurance cards, Gery does
not speak German, he does not know what the EU health insurance card will cover
and what it won’t cover but what he really needs is money right now to help with day to day living costs.
All of their savings have now been used up on
the cost of him staying with her at the hospital. The Hungarian Government will
not help them because they have lived in the UK too long and paid their taxes
here. He has not been able to contact the UK government services for help.
Anett is now out of her coma but is unable to
talk, write or walk. She cannot remember what happened. She still has to
undergo an operation to place an implant over the gap in her skull. They have
to remain in Germany until she recovers from the implant operation and this
means that they are in real trouble financially.
Friends of the couple have set up this crowd

funding account to bring Anett home to Shetland. Please can you help?

STRIG is a massage device for all lifestyles. Unlike traditional “low frequency vibration” or “hammer impact motion” massage devices, STRIG incorporates micro-vibration technology to accelerate muscle relaxation and promote the growth of muscle fibers. STRIG also emits micro currents throughout the muscle to reduce the build-up of lactic acid in order to prevent muscle soreness.
column167:
s=fac95bbe3f9890481598b91a309d0ac3"" src=""""/>

Strig’s curvature design was designed by a team of physical therapists who have devoted a lot of time and energy into product research. 

Its ergonomic design molds perfectly to any body type while allowing you to press directly onto the muscle and get to at those hard to reach areas. Strig is also designed to help everyone obtain professional-quality massage treatments whether you’re at home, the office, the gym, or any other location.

We believe that having access to professional quality massages at an affordable price is something that everyone deserves.
column255:
s=983ec6e53519a6f5f3de91bf4ccc6ca2"" src=""""/>

Microcurrent is a Nobel Prize-winning therapy for muscle pain management. STRIG's microcurrent technology was developed to precisely mimic the human body's natural electrical properties
column256:
it helps re-boost your biological electrical system.

Source :  https://bit.ly/2XdOjHV
column264:
s=945994de2a399be1fb450e4253a1abeb"" src=""""/>

The human muscle layer is located beneath the skin and fat tissue layers (Epidermis, Dermis and Subcutaneous tissue). Therefore, it is hard to reach with traditional vibration massage devices because they tend to only reach the surface level tissue layer. However, STRIG's microcurrent technology sends low-level electrical currents(25uA) that mimic the body's own natural electrical current which helps in stimulating the deepest muscle layers. The microcurrents emitted from STRIG also help reduce the build-up of lactic acid which can help prevent muscle soreness when used in advance.
column265:
wmode=transparent"" width=""612"">

iPhone and iPad use capacitive touch screens. These screens use a finger's electrical conductivity to disrupt the screen's own electrostatic field. So that is why STRIG can unlock the iPhone passcode because it emits microcurrents. In contrast, the traditional massager can’t unlock the iPhone passcode since it doesn’t emit microcurrents.
column282: wmode=transparent"" width=""612"">
column283: >
column290:
s=6902945410a2f72e4b74d5434ff28ac3"" src=""""/>

The general blade-type massage tool(for IASTM) is made for professional use, because, in order to use it, you are generally required to have professional massage certification to locate and treat the damaged areas with the appropriate amount of pressure. However, Strig is designed to add micro-vibration technology to the blade-type massage tool, which helps you to experience a professional-quality massage with ease, even if you don’t have professional knowledge and skills.
column314:
s=bb4979908202132b666e54f8b64492f4"" src=""""/>

STRIG increases the temperature of the area that is massaged by generating friction heat. This heat promotes greater blood circulation in the treated area which allows for more nutrients and oxygen to be delivered to the damaged muscle tissues. Through this, the muscle tissues are stimulated properly and the cells repair themselves at a faster rate.
column339:
wmode=transparent"" width=""459"">

Both hammer impact motion massager and blade-type massager differ in the way they impact on an object. As you can see from the thermal sensor images, most massages implement the use of a ball or hammer shape to create high impact on a specific hitting point. This does not stimulate the muscles evenly and can be very painful. STRIG’s blade design is designed to mold perfectly to any body so that you can experience a massage that can be performed evenly throughout the targeted area.
column363:
s=008a250d5dfb87256673669d8143b16d"" src=""""/>

Strig has three adjustable levels of micro-vibration intensity to meet your needs depending on the designated massage area. One press of a button will allow you to change the intensity of your massage.
column403: s=f7f31adcfd4c8bfcafc4455a93e4696e"" src=""""/>
column553:
>

As a physical therapist who has been treating patients in hospitals for over 10 years, I became very accustomed to using different IASTM tools. Traditional IASTM tools allows the user to release Myofascial pain (a fancy word for muscle pain) through soft tissue mobilization. Since 2015, my team and I have trained physical therapists as well as those in training and also helped each person create tools that suited each individual's style. 

The IASTM tools I was using were somewhat effective and easy to use, but they did not synergize well with the Graston technique, which I specialized in. Therefore, I wanted to develop a product that could be used not only by professionals like me, but by anyone who experiences muscle pain.

As I start my day, I look through my EDC collection and face a hard decision as to what to carry. Perhaps, like me, you feel certain products fit your mood or situation better than others that day? Like the practicality of a ring spinner when driving, or the unassuming nature of a desk spinner when at work?

By leveraging my experience in designing products, I created a fully functional, modular device that solves this carry dilemma. Each aspect of the design functions perfectly, as each individual item would if bought separately. The transition between function remains seamless.
Here's what the AIO can do for you

Worry Stones and coins have existed for eons, but their popularity is rising among the EDC community. Countless hours of research, design, prototyping and testing helped me identify the perfect curvature that offers maximum satisfaction and comfort to a wide variety of finger sizes.

The Damned AIO is a unique device that combines 3 different types of fidget spinners into one. The intention is to not only appeal to existing fidget spinner enthusiasts, but to spark the interest of new people to the hobby of spinning.
With the AIO, you can switch between a Desk Spinner, Hand Spinner and my personal favorite, a Ring Spinner with incredible ease by just attaching or removing a small, high precision part.

By adding the Spinning Top attachment to your Damned AIO you get a premium spinning top. Comparable to some of the very best CNC machined spinning tops on the market, it has been designed to spin rapidly on a smooth surface. It seemingly stands still!
Spin times will vary based on factors out of our control but we have done everything to ensure it has the stability and balance that's expected from a top.
Regardless of whether you are a collector or someone new to these hobbies, the AIO is an absolute winner for everyday use.

HOW ELSE CAN YOU HELP

It's alright if you cannot donate towards our project. Please share the project with your friends and family!

","THE PROBLEM AND THE SOLUTION

As I start my day, I look through my EDC collection and face a hard decision as to what to carry. Perhaps, like me, you feel certain products fit your mood or situation better than others that day? Like the practicality of a ring spinner when driving, or the unassuming nature of a desk spinner when at work?

By leveraging my experience in designing products, I created a fully functional, modular device that solves this carry dilemma. Each aspect of the design functions perfectly, as each individual item would if bought separately. The transition between function remains seamless.
Here's what the AIO can do for you

Worry Stones and coins have existed for eons, but their popularity is rising among the EDC community. Countless hours of research, design, prototyping and testing helped me identify the perfect curvature that offers maximum satisfaction and comfort to a wide variety of finger sizes.

The Damned AIO is a unique device that combines 3 different types of fidget spinners into one. The intention is to not only appeal to existing fidget spinner enthusiasts, but to spark the interest of new people to the hobby of spinning.
With the AIO, you can switch between a Desk Spinner, Hand Spinner and my personal favorite, a Ring Spinner with incredible ease by just attaching or removing a small, high precision part.

By adding the Spinning Top attachment to your Damned AIO you get a premium spinning top. Comparable to some of the very best CNC machined spinning tops on the market, it has been designed to spin rapidly on a smooth surface. It seemingly stands still!
Spin times will vary based on factors out of our control but we have done everything to ensure it has the stability and balance that's expected from a top.
Regardless of whether you are a collector or someone new to these hobbies, the AIO is an absolute winner for everyday use.
HOW ELSE CAN YOU HELPIt's alright if you cannot donate towards our project. Please share the project with your friends and family!",3.0,0,"3 Campaigns
