has set a pretty high benchmark for longevity. She attributed her resilience to olive oil and a daily exercise routine.  As the oldest recorded living person, we are happy to make her the patron saint of Game Of Life.

The mission of Game Of Life is to help you to extend your life to its maximum and to reduce the risks of disease.  We are unique in that we have a compassionate empathy bot (Golly) that uses neural network methodologies to learn about you and propose the ways in which you can reach your stated goals.
Research suggests that compassion is the most effective way to get results, but don't be fooled, as a personal trainer, he will be resolute in guiding you.

Tell GOLLY your age, gender, weight and height and GOLLY will tell you how long the average person of your gender, age, weight and height, can expect to live.   When you give Golly more information about your aerobic fitness, or strength or endurance, Golly will be able to estimate your probable lifespan. But that is only where it starts. You can set a goal and a date and Golly will plot and monitor the most effective multifactorial strategy for you to achieve that goal in the allotted time.
So in exchange for 5 minutes of your time, let us try to convince you that we can deliver information and a process that will indeed extend your life and reduce the risk of disease.
5 minutes for a decade or more of vibrant good health.  do we have a deal?
I have found a new purpose in life. If GOL can help people increase the prospect of a longer vibrant life then it will be doing good.

As we are appealing to baby boomers +-10 years, the number of people it can help is practically limitless. Think of the pain and suffering that can be avoided if many people start living a lifestyle that minimises the risk of disease.

This started as a personal goal to do what was necessary to remain a player in the Game Of Life as long as possible.  It gave me a new zest and a desire to share what I was learning.
Having been a serial entrepreneur in the IT industry. I naturally thought about packaging what I was learning in an App so the curated knowledge could be shared.
But to do this I needed to hire the right technical people.
I have been very lucky to have found a team that has successfully brought a nutrition App to market.  But GOL is much more than a nutrition App.
I also stumbled on a senior Apple software developer who is doing research into AI.

And thus was GOLLY born.  GOLLY (Game Of Long Life for You) uses neural network methodologies to learn from the data it receives about someone so that he can direct the activities of that person towards the achievement of the goals that person has specified.
But if GOLLY is going effective he will need to be imbued with compassionate empathy,
My enthusiasm comes at significant financial cost.
Game Of Life has been a year in the making and we are nearly there. Unfortunately, the year has depleted my financial resources. I need an injection of cash to keep the target delivery date on track.
The Body module should be ready for beta testing in December and the Brain module next January.

Is an Android and iOS App and a Wordpress blog designed to guide and motivate members to take the actions necessary to extend life and reduce the risk of disease.

 

The Body module

The Body Module gives you the tools to eat the right nutrient-dense foods in the right quantities, It encourages you to move in the most efficient manner to meet your health needs goals. It will monitor your fibre and probiotic intake so your gut supports your health.
The food column includes previously analysed recipes.
On the right, the nutrient wheel shows the proportions of fats, proteins, carbohydrates, fibre and calories/kilojoules.
The nutrient shortfall accumulates and highlights the deficiencies of the nutrients, vitamins, minerals, and amino acids for the week.
Click on GOLLY to see which foods have the highest concentrations of the deficient nutrients.

You are invited to contribute your favourite recipe, whether its Grandma’s secret or the best Keto imaginable. The recipes are analysed for nutrients and saved in a format that will enable the publishing of a book. The contributor of the best recipe each week earns an award that can be redeemed in our health goods related shop.

The Brain Module helps you sleep adequately. It engineers social inclusion through a buddy system. It asks you to set and it helps you meet, goals that give your life meaning. It gives you the tools to understand your psychological profile. Mindfulness, meditation, relaxation and just chilling all prolong life. We provide the resources you will need.

Laughter is not only the best medicine, it helps us live longer. Enjoy our daily joke. Contribute the bedtime story that enraptured your kids or grandkids. Give us your favourite recipe.  We will publish and donatee the proceeds to www.feedthechildren.org.

 

The Wordpress Blog

harvests and presents peer-reviewed scientific papers on the factors affecting morbidity, including nutrition, exercise, microbiome, sleep, meditation, brain entrainment, sense of purpose, social inclusion, and humour.
It is through our brain that we experience who we are. Our task is to provide our brains with the best environment for it to function.
Knowledge is power so we kick off with the Ryff scale of Psychological wellbeing delivered over 6 weeks with an assessment each week of one of the six categories.
Poor sleep hygiene is associated with increased mortality.  We have proprietary music visualisation software that entrains the brain to a soporific state through binaural mimicry.
Our market is primarily Baby Boomers and many of you have wonderful bedtime stories that calmed your children and grandchildren. Submit them so we can share them and publish them.
Meditators live longer, have less stress and disease than the average population.
Kirtan Kyria protects against Alzheimer's. Vipassana builds neurons. Yoga, rest, relaxation, Pilates all confer benefits.  We have tutorials on each of these.
The key to success is to develop a sense of purpose. Tell us about it and let GOLLY provide curated and psychologically appropriate coaching and motivation.
So, apart from AI Coaching, what do you get with Game of Life?
How we can express our gratitude for your contribution
We need 300 contributors at $100AUD each to cover the next few months commitments.
There must be many thousands of Indegogo viewers who would like to live longer and healthier. GOL will help them do that in some unique ways.
- As beta testers, you will have access to the App for 12 months after its launch.
- Your $100 commitment represents around 40% of what the initial subscribers will be paying.
GOL accesses data from wearable devices. You will need a smartwatch.
You can obtain this from our gameof.life  WordPress shop .
If you already have a smartwatch please give it to someone else who could benefit.
We have developed some unique proprietary fitness calculators.
There are three widely researched tests with reference data that can be used to approximate one's physical fitness, maximal aerobic capacity and strength level.
We are selling them as stand-alone products but as they are part of the future App we will send them to you now.

We have five calculators based on peer-researched algorithms which assess biological age from different perspectives. They assess aerobic fitness, strength, metabolic health, psychological wellness and deficit accumulation. The combination of these assessments will give a fairly accurate estimate of your current biological age and the probable years to live.  ""Know Thyself"" so you can plan your road to a younger and healthier self.
You will be able to approximate your biological age with these simple tests.
The 6MWT only requires a flat surface of 12M or more. Measure a distance and place cones then walk for 6 minutes and record distance.
The 6MWT assesses the distance walked in 6 minutes as a submaximal test of aerobic capacity and endurance.
Reference standards have been gathered from seven countries. The most important factor influencing the 6MWD in healthy subjects was age. Also, the 6MWD is greater in males than females.

The calculator will inform you of the percentile band you fall in for people of similar age, gender, weight, and height. You will also see the age at which you would have fallen into the 50th percentile.
The goal is to grow younger physiologically. So, put down a goal date and distance and then from time to time retest yourself to see how you are going.

Grip Strength is a measure of overall muscular strength and has been associated with disability, morbidity and mortality. In a large 11000+ person study, it was concluded that reference values for grip strength increased through childhood and adolescence, peaked around age 40, and then declined. Reference values were higher for males than for females.
Our calculator uses the algorithms developed in that study.
If you don't have access to a handgrip dynamometer you can get one from our shop
The risk of dying from cardiovascular disease is  21 % lower for each increase of 3.5 mL/kg/min, or 1 MET.
This association persists after adjusting the analysis for confounding factors. The risk of dying from all causes during follow-up is gradually reduced with better fitness.
The Fitness Calculator estimates your fitness age measured as maximum oxygen uptake (VO2max).
Traditionally this test requires a mask connected to a machine that measures the composition of the subject's breath during graded exercise taken to exhaustion.
Results derived this way will be more accurate than the 6MWT approximation. But the difference in accuracy is not significant.
The frailty index outperforms DNA methylation age and its derivatives as an indicator of biological age

The measurement of biological age, as opposed to chronological age, is important to allow the study of factors that are responsible for the heterogeneity in the decline in health and function ability among individuals during aging. Various measures of biological aging have been proposed. Frailty indices based on health deficits in diverse body systems have been well studied, and we have documented the use of a frailty index (FI34) composed of 34 health items, for measuring biological age.

Any useful measure of biological age must predict survival better than chronological age does. Meta-analyses indicate that age acceleration difference and age acceleration residual are significant predictors of mortality, qualifying them as indicators of biological age.

In the presence of chronological age as a covariate, FI34 was a significant predictor of mortality, whereas none of the DNA methylation age-based metrics was. The outperformance of FI34 over DNA methylation age measures was apparent when FI34 and each of the DNA methylation age measures was used together as explanatory variables, along with chronological age: FI34 remained significant but the DNA methylation measures did not. These results indicate that FI34 is a robust predictor of biological age, while these DNA methylation measures are largely a statistical reflection of the passage of chronological time.
The term biological aging has been developed to conceptualize the fact that individuals differ in their manifestation of age changes as they age chronologically.
FI34 increases exponentially with age, indicating declining health and function ability. The rate of increase accelerates approximately 2~3 % annually.
A survival analysis indicates that FI34 predicts mortality better than does chronological age.
The fact that FI34 predicts mortality/survival better than does the simple passage of time indicates that it is more than a naive chronometer. Rather, it is a metric of biological age.

One of the most widely used survey instruments is Ryff’s multi-dimensional Psychological Well-being scales (PWB). It was specifically defined to measure positive aspects of psychological functioning along six theoretically-motivated dimensions: independence and self-determination (autonomy)
column2: having satisfying, high quality relationships (positive relations with others)
column3: the ability to manage one’s life (environmental mastery)
column4: being open to new experiences (personal growth)
column5: believing that one’s life is meaningful (purpose in life)
column6: and a positive attitude towards oneself and one’s past life (self-acceptance).

column1: It is projected that a retired 65-year-old couple can anticipate health care costs of $275,000 out-of-pocket in the USA.  At 90% of the cost of a Big Mac each week, a subscription to Game Of Life and coaching by GOLLY looks like an excellent investment.
My wife Cathy and I have been married for 56 years.
I have been a serial entrepreneur throughout my life.

I started with IBM in South Africa. In 1972 I established my own business “Automated Pay” and the following year “Computed Investment Advisory Services”.   Both companies were successful and were sold into Central Data Systems Ltd. pursuant to their listing on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange.

column4: >In Aug 2018, I had an epiphany moment. I am approaching my 80th. year, and it suddenly dawned on me that I am running out of time.

column1: I started searching for ways in which I could postpone my appointment with Mr.Reaper.
What I found was so motivating that I felt the need to share what I was learning.
The desire is not purely philanthropic. I also want to monetize gameof.life. I have a wonderful wife, four sons, their partners, and six grandchildren, all of whom could use a legacy.
However, I intend to hold on to that legacy for as long as possible.

My Journey

 

I have been trying to “walk the walk” so that I would feel more comfortable in “talking the talk”.
To that end, in the last year, I have lost 14kg, reduced my girth by 6cm, and acquired a biological age of 65.
I think I was a couple of years younger than my chronological age when I started out but I am prepared to attribute an extra 10 to the “longevity” lifestyle I have been living since last August.
It is always risky to take a chance on software that has not yet been proven. GOL is no exception.
On the other hand, early adopters have a higher tolerance for the inevitable teething bugs.
For our part, we are very appreciative of the valuable role they play in stress testing the application.
A big part of why we are seeking crowdfunding is so that we can retain our development team to address any problems as they arise.

In the concept design of GOL, we have a number of ways in which members can earn vouchers to spend in our health store. If their recipe, bedtime story, or funny video/joke,  is voted best of the week, they will earn an award which they can redeem at the shop.
We recognise that discovering and weeding out bugs is an essential and valuable part of software development.

We will give every early adopter who discovers a new bug or makes a suggestion that we adopt, an additional year's free access.

 

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you are not ready to take the plunge, we hope you will register to receive our eBook.
If you think that the information and guidance in longevity and health maintenance is valuable we would appreciate your sharing this crowdfunding invitation to your friends and family.
Indiegogo has some convenient share tools to help you do this
Heart ""Follow"" - For visitors with Indiegogo accounts to follow the campaign to receive email updates posted by the campaign team
Facebook- Share the campaign through your Facebook page
Twitter - Tweet the campaign out to your followers
Link - Copy the campaign URL and paste it into an email, social media update, or wherever else you'd like to share it.

You can obtain this from our gameof.life  WordPress shop .
If you already have a smartwatch please give it to someone else who could benefit.
We have developed some unique proprietary fitness calculators.
There are three widely researched tests with reference data that can be used to approximate one's physical fitness, maximal aerobic capacity and strength level.
We are selling them as stand-alone products but as they are part of the future App we will send them to you now.

We have five calculators based on peer-researched algorithms which assess biological age from different perspectives. They assess aerobic fitness, strength, metabolic health, psychological wellness and deficit accumulation. The combination of these assessments will give a fairly accurate estimate of your current biological age and the probable years to live.  ""Know Thyself"" so you can plan your road to a younger and healthier self.
You will be able to approximate your biological age with these simple tests.
The 6MWT only requires a flat surface of 12M or more. Measure a distance and place cones then walk for 6 minutes and record distance.
The 6MWT assesses the distance walked in 6 minutes as a submaximal test of aerobic capacity and endurance.
Reference standards have been gathered from seven countries. The most important factor influencing the 6MWD in healthy subjects was age. Also, the 6MWD is greater in males than females.

The calculator will inform you of the percentile band you fall in for people of similar age, gender, weight, and height. You will also see the age at which you would have fallen into the 50th percentile.
The goal is to grow younger physiologically. So, put down a goal date and distance and then from time to time retest yourself to see how you are going.

Grip Strength is a measure of overall muscular strength and has been associated with disability, morbidity and mortality. In a large 11000+ person study, it was concluded that reference values for grip strength increased through childhood and adolescence, peaked around age 40, and then declined. Reference values were higher for males than for females.
Our calculator uses the algorithms developed in that study.
If you don't have access to a handgrip dynamometer you can get one from our shop
The risk of dying from cardiovascular disease is  21 % lower for each increase of 3.5 mL/kg/min, or 1 MET.
This association persists after adjusting the analysis for confounding factors. The risk of dying from all causes during follow-up is gradually reduced with better fitness.
The Fitness Calculator estimates your fitness age measured as maximum oxygen uptake (VO2max).
Traditionally this test requires a mask connected to a machine that measures the composition of the subject's breath during graded exercise taken to exhaustion.
Results derived this way will be more accurate than the 6MWT approximation. But the difference in accuracy is not significant.
The frailty index outperforms DNA methylation age and its derivatives as an indicator of biological age

The measurement of biological age, as opposed to chronological age, is important to allow the study of factors that are responsible for the heterogeneity in the decline in health and function ability among individuals during aging. Various measures of biological aging have been proposed. Frailty indices based on health deficits in diverse body systems have been well studied, and we have documented the use of a frailty index (FI34) composed of 34 health items, for measuring biological age.

Any useful measure of biological age must predict survival better than chronological age does. Meta-analyses indicate that age acceleration difference and age acceleration residual are significant predictors of mortality, qualifying them as indicators of biological age.

In the presence of chronological age as a covariate, FI34 was a significant predictor of mortality, whereas none of the DNA methylation age-based metrics was. The outperformance of FI34 over DNA methylation age measures was apparent when FI34 and each of the DNA methylation age measures was used together as explanatory variables, along with chronological age: FI34 remained significant but the DNA methylation measures did not. These results indicate that FI34 is a robust predictor of biological age, while these DNA methylation measures are largely a statistical reflection of the passage of chronological time.
The term biological aging has been developed to conceptualize the fact that individuals differ in their manifestation of age changes as they age chronologically.
FI34 increases exponentially with age, indicating declining health and function ability. The rate of increase accelerates approximately 2~3 % annually.
A survival analysis indicates that FI34 predicts mortality better than does chronological age.
The fact that FI34 predicts mortality/survival better than does the simple passage of time indicates that it is more than a naive chronometer. Rather, it is a metric of biological age.

One of the most widely used survey instruments is Ryff’s multi-dimensional Psychological Well-being scales (PWB). It was specifically defined to measure positive aspects of psychological functioning along six theoretically-motivated dimensions: independence and self-determination (autonomy)
column2: having satisfying, high quality relationships (positive relations with others)
column3: the ability to manage one’s life (environmental mastery)
column4: being open to new experiences (personal growth)
column5: believing that one’s life is meaningful (purpose in life)
column6: and a positive attitude towards oneself and one’s past life (self-acceptance).

column1: It is projected that a retired 65-year-old couple can anticipate health care costs of $275,000 out-of-pocket in the USA.  At 90% of the cost of a Big Mac each week, a subscription to Game Of Life and coaching by GOLLY looks like an excellent investment.
My wife Cathy and I have been married for 56 years.
I have been a serial entrepreneur throughout my life.

I started with IBM in South Africa. In 1972 I established my own business “Automated Pay” and the following year “Computed Investment Advisory Services”.   Both companies were successful and were sold into Central Data Systems Ltd. pursuant to their listing on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange.
.In Aug 2018, I had an epiphany moment. I am approaching my 80th. year, and it suddenly dawned on me that I am running out of time.
I started searching for ways in which I could postpone my appointment with Mr.Reaper.
What I found was so motivating that I felt the need to share what I was learning.
The desire is not purely philanthropic. I also want to monetize gameof.life. I have a wonderful wife, four sons, their partners, and six grandchildren, all of whom could use a legacy.
However, I intend to hold on to that legacy for as long as possible.
My Journey I have been trying to “walk the walk” so that I would feel more comfortable in “talking the talk”.
To that end, in the last year, I have lost 14kg, reduced my girth by 6cm, and acquired a biological age of 65.
I think I was a couple of years younger than my chronological age when I started out but I am prepared to attribute an extra 10 to the “longevity” lifestyle I have been living since last August.
It is always risky to take a chance on software that has not yet been proven. GOL is no exception.
On the other hand, early adopters have a higher tolerance for the inevitable teething bugs.
For our part, we are very appreciative of the valuable role they play in stress testing the application.
A big part of why we are seeking crowdfunding is so that we can retain our development team to address any problems as they arise.

In the concept design of GOL, we have a number of ways in which members can earn vouchers to spend in our health store. If their recipe, bedtime story, or funny video/joke,  is voted best of the week, they will earn an award which they can redeem at the shop.
We recognise that discovering and weeding out bugs is an essential and valuable part of software development.
We will give every early adopter who discovers a new bug or makes a suggestion that we adopt, an additional year's free access. Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you are not ready to take the plunge, we hope you will register to receive our eBook.
If you think that the information and guidance in longevity and health maintenance is valuable we would appreciate your sharing this crowdfunding invitation to your friends and family.
Indiegogo has some convenient share tools to help you do this
Heart ""Follow"" - For visitors with Indiegogo accounts to follow the campaign to receive email updates posted by the campaign team
Facebook- Share the campaign through your Facebook page
Twitter - Tweet the campaign out to your followers
Link - Copy the campaign URL and paste it into an email, social media update, or wherever else you'd like to share it.",14.0,0,"1 Campaign
<h2><strong>Our Modern Lives™: 21<sup>st</sup> Century Fragrances for Body &amp
We’re 4160Tuesdays. We make fragrances in London, one of the busiest, stimulating, fascinating cities in the world. Sarah McCartney, our founder and perfumer, also teaches yoga
column2: sometimes you just need an escape from all that action. With the pressure and excitement of running a business, she needs a balance, an escape from the blue screens and wifi that dominate our lives.

column1: Five years ago Sarah made five yoga room fragrances for her own use
column2: Our Modern Lives has developed from that project.

column1: Every week we’re asked for two things: 100% natural fragrances, and safe scents with no allergens. People often imagine they can have both in the same bottle, or that one implies that you get the other. It’s not that simple.

The issue is that nature is naughty – there are allergens in most essential oils, including jasmine, rose, lavender, all citrus fruits and the spices - which means that natural fragrance has to be handled really carefully to be safe, to be legal and still to smell great.

Recently we’ve had more requests from people who’ve found they are allergic to the naturals oils in orange peel, which you’ll find in many fragrances, or to ylang ylang, cinnamon or geranium essential oils.

With seven years’ experience of making fragrances to both the International Fragrance Association standards on personal and environmental safety and the strict EU cosmetics regulations, we’re in a good place to launch our new venture, listening to what our customers asked for, and being open about what we use to make them.
So we’ve created fragrances that give you a choice:
• Seven 100% natural fragrances. We’re using all our experience to make these complex blends beautiful and safe.
• Two 100% synthetic fragrances which have no allergens. Here we’re choosing simple blends of molecular compounds to create soft, smooth, long-lasting sensual fragrances.

We’ve sourced organic grain alcohol (denatured so you can’t drink it), essential oils, plant absolutes and natural isolates (individual fragrance compounds from plant sources) to create fragrances for everyone who wants this option.

We’re using totally benign, clean single aroma molecules made synthetically to create a fragrance which you could safely use undiluted on your skin. (Just to compare, we’ve been tweaking our powerful natural blends for several months to make them legal at 10% dilution – that’s how tricky it is to work with nature.)

You can choose just the naturals, just the synthetics or combine both. Use them together and your fragrances will smell smoother and last longer, but it’s up to you. We’re making them as roll-ons to keep your scent in your own space, and as body &
column2: room sprays to change the atmosphere around you.

column1: Sarah’s yoga students have been appreciating them for a few years now. We hope you’d like to share them too.
We're offering you the fragrances at early bird prices
• We’ve set the target at £4000 to be able to order natural materials from top quality suppliers. There are three companies we’d like to buy from, and each one has a minimum order value.

• The fragrances: after seven years making fragrances we are happiest making scents at a ratio of about 40:60 naturals to synthetics. Using synthetics is a bit like adding sodium bicarbonate and sodium chloride to your cupcakes – that’s baking powder and a pinch of salt – it might sound scary but it makes for a better result.

• We completely get that many people want just the naturals. We also get that one in 1000 people is allergic to something in perfume (often things that occur naturally in essential oils) so they need a fragrance that’s totally benign. For a long lasting fragrance,  you can that you wear the naturals on top of the synthetics, but if you want or need to, you can keep them separate.

• OML α – a soft, mildly ambery woodsy fragrance that really lasts well, made with seven synthetic materials, completely clear in colour. Some of the beautiful aroma molecules we use here are more expensive than most naturals.

• OML β – even softer and smoother and very long lasting. We chose to make OML β with materials which are widely used in perfumery, including costly niche fragrances, but they are out of patent so their prices have fallen. We wanted to make a really good, affordable fragrance, so here you are.
The Naturals: seven shades, moods and atmospheres.

We are going to keep a few of the natural ingredients secret, but here are most of those that we’ve included. We have not economised on the materials, but as we’re making them all here in our studio, and sending them to you directly, the prices are really well discounted. Expect them to at least twice the price.

Red – Harvest – Gratitude: A sense of security, nature’s bounty, reaping what we sow. For us it feels like a rich red berry in colour. Materials include: hay absolute, Turkish rose absolute, raspberry leaf absolute, oakwood CO2 extract, hazelnut CO2 extract, labdanum, wine essential oil, davana essential oil, pink peppercorn C)2 absolute.

Orange – Sunset – Peace: A sense of serenity as the sun goes down, lighting up the sky in shades of blood orange, Materials include: neroli essential oil, Honeybush CO2 extract, vanilla absolute, cocoa absolute, peach natural liquid, bran absolute, rose geranium essential oil, Virginian cedarwood essential oil.

Yellow – Sunrise – Hope: A sense of vitality, but because it’s early we’ve added in a dash of coffee for a touch of real life. Materials include: lemon petitgrain, fennel, cardamon, clementine, yellow mandarin, blood orange and sweet orange essential oils, coffee absolute, narcissus absolute and cabreuva essential oil.

Green – Leaf – New: A sense of revival. The smell of spring when green shoots appear from the cold and dark. Materials include: jasmine tea CO2 extract, green mandarin essential oil, Calabrian bergamot essential oil, cucumber natural liquid, bergamot mint essential oil and spinach absolute.

Aquamarine – Waves/WiFi – Clarity: A sense of connection. The colour of the clear warm sea, and sharp hit of citrus and deep seaweed. Materials include: white grapefruit and rosemary essential oils, olive fruit CO2 extract, jasmine sambac absolute, blue hemlock essential oil, organic English lavender essential oil, seaweed absolute.

Blue Screen/Blue Horizon – Perspective : A sense of balance. We spend too much time looking at screens, not enough at the horizon. This is a scent to help you meditate. Materials include frankincense essential oil, lavender absolute, vetivert absolute, eucalyptus mint essential oil, patchouli essential oil, hyacinth absolute, organic English lavender essential oil.

Indigo – Into the Night: A sense of the infinite. A 3a.m. scent of total darkness, when night feels endless. Materials include: Cognac absolute, black tea CO2 extract, osmanthus absolute, Atlas cedarwood essential oil, jasmine sambac absolute, labdanum absolute, rum CO2 extract.
• Personal fragrances: we’re making 10ml rollerball sizes so you can apply your natural fragrances without filling the air around you, if you prefer that. They are eau de parfum strength.

• Body sprays: these are less concentrated fragrances 100ml bottles, and are safe for use on the body, and also for use as a room spray. We had these in mind for yoga teachers who have to go into a studio after a fast paced (sweaty) aerobics class just happened.

• Skin scents: for now, we’re putting these in 50ml atomiser bottles at eau de parfum strength. Wear them with the naturals to make them last longer, feel smoother and smell more like perfumes usually do. Wear them on their own because they don’t have any allergens at all and because they smell fantastic.
To go ahead, we need materials in bigger quantities

• We’re a tiny company, but now we’ve grown just about big enough to approach specialist suppliers of rare essential oils. We need to buy a minimum amount. If we can buy by the 100g or the kilo, then we can afford to produce these fragrances affordably. Through crowdfunding we generate enough orders in advance to buy what we need.

• We know that fragrance is a personal thing, and that committing before you buy is a brave step. For that reason we are setting the prices far lower than they will be when we launch officially in September.

• Even if we don’t reach the target, you will still get your fragrances. We’ll have to buy small quantities and we might not be able to launch the whole range later this year, but all our backers will come out smelling great at the end.

• If we smash the target, we’ll have room for random acts of kindness, and we’ll happily accept ideas. One is to help establish community gardens, another to raise money for food banks. We’re acknowledge that we’re fortunate to be here setting up a business idea.

column2: it’s gone pretty well so far.

column1: • Look us up and you’ll see that this is our seventh project. They’re small but special, and we’ve always fulfilled our perks and our promises.

• Why does the world need more scents? We could ask why the world needs more books, films, paintings or songs. We see fragrance as a creative way to make the world more beautiful. It also employs people, pays its taxes and makes our customers happy. These particular scents answer two needs which we can fulfil, naturals that actually smell great, and synthetics which have no allergens in them.
• Availability of more materials – but we’ve contacted the suppliers and they are ready to go.
• We get struck by lightning, or similar. We’ll try to stay out of harm’s way, but there are some risks we can’t avoid. We’re fully insured though.
• We get too many orders and can’t cope? We’re setting the numbers of perks realistically so that we really can fulfil all our orders ourselves. After that, we plan to launch the brand in September.
Who do you know who might love what we do?
If you like this, do please share it with your social media contacts.
The one in 1000 people who are allergic to something in perfume probably won’t be looking at this. If you know one, perhaps you’d like to direct that person to our safe synthetic fragrances.
Maybe you know some people who are finding it really hard to find interesting, affordable, genuine 100% naturals. You can send them straight to us, confident that we do exactly what we say.

The Mission:

Knockout Cancer is an annual charity boxing event aiming to improve the lives of children on two important fronts by giving them opportunities for medical care and athletic activities.

Each day, 46 children are diagnosed with cancer. Each day, countless other children and young adult lives are lost to crime, drugs, and institutions. Knockout Cancer aims to make a difference in the lives of young people. Our event was created to support two key initiatives in the Central Florida Area: Kids Beating Cancer and Florida PAL. 

The Charities:

Kids Beating Cancer was formed with the vision of having a place dedicated to curing the children of Florida and beyond at the Kids Beating Cancer Pediatric Transplant Center. Their focus is on the belief that one day, no child will have to die in the dawn of life.
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

The purpose of the State of Florida Association of Police Athletic League is to assist local PAL chapters by providing coordination, training, and programs that enhance the lives of the youth in Florida.
column11:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

The Teams:

Repton Boxing Club - ""Team UK""
column16:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

Sharipov MMA Academy - ""Team USA""
column21:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

The Goal:

We invite you to help us contribute to these two worthy causes. If we can save one child from cancer or from the streets, our mission is worth it.

column1: Website     Facebook     Twitter

column2:
>World's 1st to record insulin dosages Automatically

As is well known, there is no cure for diabetes at present. There are an estimated 415 million Diabetics around the World and the only way to keep diabetes under control is proper management. Insulin dosages, blood glucose levels, dietary intake, and physical activity can have a great influence on diabetes management.

However, our fast-paced lifestyles and various kinds of food constantly tempt us to stray away from healthy diabetes management. The absence of self-control and the sometimes loneliness of being a Diabetic can make diabetes management much more difficult. So, it is crucial to have an App with recording, reminding, and sharing functions.

The appearance of the Dnurse App has been welcomed and recognized by a lot of Diabetics
column3:
the emergence of insulinK™ makes it that much more perfect. Now, the Dnurse App is the world's first App to auto-record insulin dosages.

The advancement of technology is making Peoples’ lives even healthier. We hope that insulinK™ will not only make diabetes management more intelligent but that this project will arouse People's concerns about their own non-Diabetic health, as well as bring more attention to the Diabetics around them.

insulinK™ uses the Dnurse smartphone App to become the 1st product in the world to record blood glucose levels, insulin dosages, medication, dietary intake, physical activity, and blood pressure. All data will be automatically uploaded to the Dnurse cloud and preserved permanently.

Insulin dosages recorded and uploaded to the Dnurse App by insulinK™ will be combined with blood glucose levels to generate Personal Data Journals. Diabetics will further understand the relationship between their blood glucose levels and insulin dosages, as well as gain Personalized real-time feedback and informative suggestions from IDSS (Intelligent Decision Supporting System).

With the Dnurse App and seamless Social Media sharing tools, Diabetics can share their glycemic status with approved Family, Doctors, Friends, and also learn more about diabetes.

Set reminders and timers so that you will never forget to take your medication, inject insulin, and measure your blood glucose wherever you go. IDSS (Intelligent Decision Supporting System) can give you Personalized recommendations about your blood glucose levels and insulin dosages according to your own Personal situation.

  • insulinK™ is easy to use 

Download the Dnurse App and put insulinK™ on an insulin pen

  • insulinK™ uses low power technology 

1 button battery can last up to 100 days.

  • insulinK™: compact, portable, &
column4:
usable anywhere

  • *Please follow the instruction manual when changing the battery*

column3:
Structure

Founded in July 2013, Beijing Dnurse Technology Ltd. is a mobile Internet company focused on diabetes management. With advanced Smartphone Blood Glucose Meters, smart Apps, cloud databases, and novel ""Devices + App + Service"" business model, we help Diabetics maintain a simple and convenient self-management system. Blood glucose monitoring, cloud storage, Social Media sharing, remote access, reminders / timers, and recommendations for daily diet, exercise, medication, and exchange of diabetes-related Experiences, all through the App and its social network. Through the use of mobile Internet technology, Dnurse provides reliable tools, regulating the everyday habits of Diabetics, managing blood glucose with precision, reducing complications, and subsequent medical costs. 

In addition to China, our products are exported to Europe, India, the Middle East, Africa and other regions. There are a lot of users of Dnurse now.

Our R &
column4: D team is from a variety of backgrounds:

column1:
• China's CCTV featured US several times

We have been working hard, but we still need Your help to make the Dnurse App and insulinK™ more accessible to People and, ultimately, help more Diabetics. Now, insulinK™ is only compatible with Eli Lilly insulin pens (HumaPen Luxura / Luxura HD). We are crowdfunding to continue developing insulinK™ and make it usable with a variety of different insulin pens and provide better health services to Diabetics.

  • P.S. whether You back this project or not 

You can download the Dnurse App in the App store. We sincerely invite all Diabetics around the world to give it a try at least.

 

FAQ

1、Is insulinK compatible to all insulin pen? If not, will you develop insulinK to make it more compatible?
It is a pity that insulinK is not compatible with all insulin pens. It is only compatible with with Eli Lilly insulin pens (HumaPen Luxura / Luxura HD) now. After the success of the campaign, we will develop insulinK to more insulin pens.

2、How can I use it? Is it easy?
Yes. It is easy to use. You can just download Dnurse APP in app store. And put Insulink on an insulin pen, touch it, and Insulink will power up automatically. Then open Dnurse APP and connect insulinK. 

3、As you said, it is very important to know the relationship between blood glucose level and insulin dosage. Can I trust your product?  Is the audio technology correct or not?
Yes, of course you can trust us. After many trials, insulinK uses noise reduction, audio processing, and speech recognition technology to record insulin dosages collected by the highly sensitive microphone when the insulin pen’s dosage knob / dial is turned. All data collected are correct and appropriate.

4、Where can I get one since the campaign is over?
If you want to buy insulinK, you can follow our official website www.dnurse.com we will update follow-up information or you can click “contact us” on the website.

5、I am 60 years old now and I have a bad memory. Does it have any reminder for people like us to have a better diabetes management? 
InsulinK is designed for all users in any age. It is really helpful. After download Dnurse APP, you can type in your personal information and set reminder so that you will never forget to take your medication, inject insulin, and measure your blood glucose wherever you go. Also every time, you inject insulin, it will transfer your data to Dnurse APP, you can check the record if you cannot remember whether you inject insulin or not last time.

6、 What about the standby time of the battery?
 insulinK uses low power technology. 1 button battery can last up to about 180 days.

7、If I support this project, when can get one?
We will arrange shipment in November.

8、My son is a T1D, if I get one insulinK, can I know his diabetes management when he is in school?
Of course you can. After inject insulin, all data will be transferred to Dnurse APP and he can share it with you by seamless Social Media sharing tools. Then you can have real-time information about his diabetes.

9、Can I have more information about your company? Do you have any popular product before?
The name of our company is Beijing Dnurse Technology Ltd. You can search it online. It was founded in July 2013. We have Dnure Xing and Dnurse Pro. They were warmly welcomed in China since its release. Also, our products are also popular in many places, like India, the Middle East and Africa. So you can trust our ability. 

10、Is it a Chinese company? If there is a shop in America that I can buy insuliK?
Yes, we are a Chinese company. Currently insulinK is only sold in China. Here is our official website www.dnurse.com if you have any further question, please leave a message.

World's 1st to record insulin dosages AutomaticallyAs is well known, there is no cure for diabetes at present. There are an estimated 415 million Diabetics around the World and the only way to keep diabetes under control is proper management. Insulin dosages, blood glucose levels, dietary intake, and physical activity can have a great influence on diabetes management.However, our fast-paced lifestyles and various kinds of food constantly tempt us to stray away from healthy diabetes management. The absence of self-control and the sometimes loneliness of being a Diabetic can make diabetes management much more difficult. So, it is crucial to have an App with recording, reminding, and sharing functions.The appearance of the Dnurse App has been welcomed and recognized by a lot of Diabetics
column2: the emergence of insulinK™ makes it that much more perfect. Now, the Dnurse App is the world's first App to auto-record insulin dosages.The advancement of technology is making Peoples’ lives even healthier. We hope that insulinK™ will not only make diabetes management more intelligent but that this project will arouse People's concerns about their own non-Diabetic health, as well as bring more attention to the Diabetics around them.insulinK™ uses the Dnurse smartphone App to become the 1st product in the world to record blood glucose levels, insulin dosages, medication, dietary intake, physical activity, and blood pressure. Hi!  Thank you for checking out our Indiegogo campaign.  I'm Joanna, co-founder of HabiDerm and here's our story:
HabiDerm is a platform designed to improve the look, feel and health of your skin by connecting, comforting, informing and inspiring you to achieve short- and long-term goals.

Through two-way text and email communication, HabiDerm learns about you and helps you track the everyday actions that have an impact on your skin’s health, look and feel.  Based on your lifestyle, we curate, relevant information and deliver personalized info “bites” to you so you can make more informed choices.  Did you know:
• Changing your pillow cases twice a week leads to less wrinkles and acne?
• Your Starbucks Grande Latte has as much sugar as nearly two Krispy Kreme donuts?
Some are so good and fun you’ll have to tell your friends!

Motivated by my 20+ years in the beauty industry (and my own personal skin struggles as a teen and a 3rd-time mom), I wanted to share my experience, what I learned and demystify the pursuit for perfect skin and reveal the industry’s “biggest” secret – the key to healthy, beautiful, radiant skin. So I joined forces with some of my BFFs including:
• a friend and colleague with whom I started a skincare and cosmetics company,
• a friend who started and owns a technology development company,
• a friend who is a strategic interactive marketing and customer retention specialist
• and my squad of beauty experts, editors, bloggers, makeup artists and aestheticians

and created HabiDerm – a health and beauty recommendation engine and custom content platform for men and women. Our mission is to inspire and empower individuals to realize their own best-self and achieve their personal beauty, health and wellness goals – without heaps of new products or procedures.
At HabiDerm, we put you first, learn your lifestyle and provide ""real-time"" feedback to help you achieve your ""best self"" and have fun doing it!

Through technology, we are transforming the journey by focusing on you - the person, not the product. As your personal skincare coach, HabiDerm messages you about the little things that can affect your skin’s health and appearance.  Our approach is two-fold:
• We take a look at the activities that you do day-in and day-out and learn how they affect your skin’s health and overall well-being.
• We cut through the clutter and curate information you can use to make informed choices and even make small changes that will lead to big improvements.

Over time, HabiDerm will get to know you – your routine, likes and dislikes – and, as our technology evolves (and funding allows), our interaction will become more personalized and tailored to you and your lifestyle choices.  HabiDerm will become a trusted adviser for all of your skincare, health and beauty questions.

Please help us reach our goal, so we can make HabiDerm available this Fall 2017.

 

TRIED, TESTED &
column2:
PROVEN 

Based on more than 50+ years of collectively team experience, we knew there was a void in the marketplace for a comprehensive and personalized single-point skincare resource. We knew women (and men) wanted visible results and streamlined information, so we created an Alpha version to prove our point.

Our Alpha phase results proved that there is a need for this product with users finding:

column1: • a noticeable improvement in their everyday choices
• they became more aware of how daily choices affected their self
• they would recommend HabiDerm to a friend

column3:
>Little changes can make a big difference!

 

THE SOCIAL IMPACT

column1: Beautiful, flawless skin. It's everywhere: in the movies, on television and magazines covers, selling products -- an image of what life could be like if we just.... The hours of air-brushing it takes to manipulate each image (not to mention the professional and personal chefs, stylists and makeup artists) are often overlooked in pursuit of idealized perfection...

Healthy, beautiful skin is achievable and the secret is at your fingertips. Like your BFF, Habiderm will become your 'go-to' for all of your skincare needs. No judgment, no finger-pointing or “I told you so,” HabiDerm is there to help you understand the impact of daily actions and how to make small changes that lead to beautiful results!

column2:
>

 

With your help, the funds raised from this Indiegogo campaign we will finish the beta and get HabiDerm into the hands of women (and men) across the country.

 

THE ASK

To date, we are completely self-funded.  We have bootstrapped it, poured every penny and gallon of sweat equity we have, and now we need your help to cross the finish line. There are several ways you can help:

column1: Click ""Back It""! We will be forever grateful and your biggest fans!
Snag Some Swag! We have great Perks to offer that we think you will love. New Perks will pop up throughout the campaign check in often to see the new swag.
Spread the Word! Tell your friends about HabiDerm and this campaign over a cocktail, at the kids' game, at the water cooler and help us get the word out.
Make Some Noise! Be social and post about our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc!

The more people that hear about HabiDerm the more likely we will be to reach, even exceed, our goal!  With your help, HabiDerm will become a reality.

 

THE RISKS, CHALLENGES &
column2:
OPPORTUNITIES

Just like anything else, there is risk…but we believe: ""if there's a will, there's a way"" and the way is clear! Our HabiDerm leadership team is uniquely qualified and positioned to seize this opportunity. 

Comprised of four individuals, each of who have 20+ years of experience in beauty, technology, customer relations, data and content-related fields, our leadership team has multiple successful start-ups to their credit and has served as senior executives in several global consumer companies. Our team intimately understands how to bring a concept to market and build and scale companies. Here's our team (click on names to see our LinkedIn profiles):
column4: >Joanna Austin (and my boys!): Co-Founder &
column8: >Jerry Mastellon (this is his baby girl who is now 13!): Co-Founder
column11: Strategic Interactive Marketing, Customer Retention Specialist, Entrepreneur
column14:
>Jeremy Shao: Advisory Board, Technologist

We are asking you to join us to empower women – your mothers, daughters, sisters and grandmothers – to stop looking outside and comparing themselves to a unrealistic standard. Above all else, our goal is to build self-confidence and self-acceptance by improving your overall health and beauty. At a time when we are inundated by images of someone’s idea of perfection, we believe our mission is evermore paramount.

column1:
0,"

Do you ever think about how much a period costs? Women living in poverty have to think about it, and sometimes have to choose between pads or tampons and food or electricity. Not only do manufacturers make around 60% even before the retailers add their profit margin, but the UK government adds VAT to this insult to women, judging their monthly needs to be ‘non-essential’ in VAT law.
Rutherglen Women for Independence and our sister organisations in Edinburgh, East Lothian and Midlothian think this situation is bad enough for those who can afford period products but completely shameful for poor women and girls. Following the East Coast Triumvirate's successful campaign to raise £1000 to put pads and tampons in every food bank in Edinburgh we want to raise funds to keep all Foodbanks in Rutherglen &
column2:
Cambuslang permanently supplied.
The government should stop adding VAT to sanitary items and recognise them as ‘essential items’ in the same way as food. That would save most women around £1 per period – you might not think that is a lot, but if so, it’s because you aren’t in these women’s shoes. VAT is added to luxury items, but sanitary products are a necessity! Why are women and girls being taxed unfairly? We don't pay VAT on going to the bingo, on crocodile &
column3:
ostrich meat, on a wee Tunnock's teacake, on a box of herbal teabags, or on edible cake decorations! Which do you think is more essential than sanitary products?
It's a global issue
Periods and poverty are keeping women and girls away from education and economic independence around the world. Many girls are missing from school during their periods because their family cannot afford sanitary towels.
There will be girls in Scotland not attending school because their parents haven't been able to afford sanitary towels for them. This will be kept a secret and won't be showing up on any statistical explanations for school absences. Pads and tampons are not provided in girls’ toilets at school alongside free soap, paper, towels and toilet paper, instead girls face the humiliating task of asking at the school office for help.
It's an equality issue
Women are bearing 85% of the financial burden of austerity policies in this country, and women are going to food banks every day to feed themselves and their families. The least we can do is make sure that they can get supplies for their periods as well as food. Periods are a natural part of girls and women's lives, and should never be seen as a source of embarrassment. It certainly should not isolate, oppress or shame girls and women.
On a personal note, I volunteer at Rutherglen Food Bank and have, on more than one occasion had to say to a woman, after she has gone through the desperate, undignified ordeal of asking, that, no, we don't have any tampons or pads today. This is unacceptable. We'd like to see products offered to women of child bearing age routinely. Help us help, please!

column1:
0,"

About myself

Hi, my name is Alexander.

Thanks for checking out my Project.

I am engineer with long experience in design and maintenance of different scientific and production equipment. Photo is my hobby since 1977. (You can find some of my  photos here  http://www.fotocommunity.com/pc/pc/mypics/1637795/display/31202732 .)

Description of project

This is axiom: to make photo better it is very helpful to keep camera stable with support (tripod or monopod). Especially with macro-lens. One of my favorite subject are butterflies. Usually they are very movable. I tried to find one proper support which is mobile, simple and quick in height adjustment. I did not find what I wanted at the market. That is why I decided to make my own device. Up to now I made few workable prototypes. The latest one has following parameters:

• Fast adjustment. Monopod has two knobs, one for length adjustment, another one for angle of head adjustment. In normal position length and angle of head are fixed. Pushing one of these knobs release lock for all sections or for the head.
• Camera fixture is also fast. Adapter has square shape and it is possible change camera's position in horizontal plane at 90° in few seconds.

• Extra feature: standalone design. It is very compact: 2 additional carbon legs (with L-shape in cut) don't increase size of monopod but give possibility use it as tripod. You can use this photo-stand as a standard monopod but with fastest fixation of height, you can install it at the desk to make self-portrait, or install it near the parapet, tree, wall.

Low weight and mobility are very important issues in trips, city tours etc.

Materials for manufacturing of carbon elements are approved for (ultralight) aircraft construction, model construction, design of sports equipment, and motor sports.
So, now I have confidence in the design of my photo-stand. In this aspect project is safe.
need 12K€ for small workshop to arrange pilot low volume production (preparation for volume production is very expensive and at this stage is very risky). With
required budget there will be only manual machines (milling machine, belt saw,
furnace, vacuum pump, tools). With bigger budget it will be possible to get small CNC
milling machine... New moulds for carbon parts, materials for pilot set and
Things to buy are clear. It does not cost much . So in this aspect project is safe also.
will get unique monopod ""MAK 1+2"". There is one analog at the market at
the same price. But it is bigger, heavier, without the head.

column2: 200€ will get discounts or personal gifts (as desired).
column6: >Other Ways You Can Help

column1: will not stop this project, does not matter will be the project funded or no.
But your support will make things faster and better.
Another important side of your support is confirmation
that this project is interesting to others and I have to go ahead to realize
friends photo-amateurs about this project. Their feedback will be very helpful.

in advance for attention and supporting my Support !

We are in need of some guardian angels!

For our beautiful daughter Destiny, a 15-year-old freshman from Andress High School. Destiny loves to dance and bake -- and hopes to one day use her passions when she grows up. We would love to see Destiny as Chef Destiny someday!

But first, we need your help. When Destiny was 12-years-old, she was diagnosed with kidney failure as a result of treatment that she had undergone due to a medical condition that she was born with. She is on Peritoneal Dialysis for 10 hours every night, and has Bilateral grade IV Hydro Ureteronephrosis.

Destiny has been approved for a Kidney Transplant, but we need your help to raise the money we need to pay for medical related expenses, hospital and doctor visits in Dallas TX , and medications. Please consider helping! Every $1 helps. 

We are also looking for volunteers who are willing to help us fundraise and share Destiny's story. If you would like to help and join us, please contact us at angiephalin@yahoo.com

Will you join us?

Again, PLEASE CONSIDER DONATING to our cause. We would be eternally grateful for your support.

Our hope is that we will be ready to jump into action the minute that we receive word that a kidney is available for Destiny. However, we will need to have some of the funds in place.

Destiny is a sweet girl who has been through so much already -- multiple hospital and doctor visits, long and unpleasant treatment options and other surgeries. Instead of going out with her friends, Destiny has to undergo Dialysis for 10 hours every night.

We need this painful process for Destiny to come to an end. In July of 2013, Destiny received her wish to ""Meet Mickey Mouse"" through the El Paso Chapter of Make-A-Wish. It was an experience that she loved, and that we will always be grateful for! It gave Destiny the hope she needed to continue fighting.

You all can be part of that fight and journey as well. You can make the difference. We hope that you choose to join us.

Hello, my name is Raymond Scott and I am the nephew of Kourtnee Green. Kourtnee was diagnosed with Metastatic Pancreatic Cancer.  From the words of Kourtnee, ""I am prepared to fight this and I'm standing strong in my Faith in GOD. Those of you who are willing to stand and fight with me I welcome your prayers and encouragement.""

NO ONE SHOULD FIGHT THIS BATTLE ALONE!!! ""THE GREEN TEAM"" would like for everyone to come together and support the one we ALL Love Ms. Kourtnee Green during her battle against Cancer.  We are asking for your words of encouragement, your prayers, and monetary donations.  All monetary donations will help with medical and daily living expenses.  I have set up a Secured Bank Account for all monies to be deposited.

Short Summary

I was diagnosed with FSGS at the age of 13, a terrible kidney disease.  I learned way too much, way too soon, about life (near death) and pinching every penny. I learned that going to college in the medical field, and jumping on insurance, was the best choice, to learn how to treat myself and others, however :

• I was always on medication and always will be.  And that's ok.  My great Aunt in the picture was the one who gave me a Kidney Transplant!
  • Even with full time employment, as a Radiographer with benefits , with medical bills I have other ""normal expenses"" that have surfaced.
  • I had to replace my screen and front door of my condo, and garage door to the condo due to cold air coming in (huge warped gap in the door frame from summer and winter weather).  I paid most of it down, yet still have quite an amount to go.  Now my car needs brakes, struts, new tires and a slew of other great things to get me to work before winter.
• Honestly, if I could just have my doors paid off I would be happy.

• There is no relaxing with a Kidney Transplant.  As Great as it is to have one, I am always concerned about way too much, even more than I have listed.

    • What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

For those who would follow the progress:

column1:
• My doors where custom made from Sears due to me living in a condo. Due to Condo Regulations this originally cost 7,080.00 NO JOKE!  I brought it down to 1,825.00 due to extra payments.
  • So the Doors are the biggest concern. Only 1,825.00 left.
  • If I reach my entire goal, my car comes next.  It is still drivable, however, the tires are not ready for winter.  My brakes are really not ready for winter.  And the most important is the control arm with ball joint (Wisconsin and Potholes).  They say if I don't get that fixed, my tire might just fly off.  I do have an idea how much that will run me, but that's last.   Summer is not over.

• Well summer is not over, and today (08.29.2014) I'm finding that I may, and I stress may, have to pay a $2,466.94 for a 1 night hospital stay from July.  The Hospital is in my insurrance network, however I need to be pre-approved even for emergencies.  I don't know how my Insurance Company can say that a Hospital is in network but then, it's not at the same time.
• The deal is that when you have a kidney transplant the slightest bug (Acute Bronchitis, or a Fever) can send you to the hospital and rack up the bills, oh so quick.

• I am an educated, working member of society.  I worked so hard to be dependant (even refused disability). But now I am humbling myself to the outreach of others. 
  • If you know someone with a transplant, ask them how much it costs to survive.

• I am getting some 'You can do it alone' comments already 'don't expect me to contribute'.  You don't have to contribute anything if you don't want to.  I do have to ask people somehow.  You give only if you want to, not because I ask to spread the word.

• To humble myself in a time of need is no laughing matter (I was literally laughed at by a coworker).  I wish that I would never have to do this.  I was born with this disease, that lead to a Kidney Transplant, and I hope that those who laughed at my face would never have to suffer these problems.

column2:
Challenges

 I have already done so much to try and save.

column1: • I've taken away all forms of TV access.
• I switched my phone to a flip phone to save $20 dollars a month.

• My challange is getting through winter.  The heat bills are just going up and up.
  • To face the challange of gas costs, my mother bought me a bicycle.
• And if worse comes to worse I'm just going to have to put the heat on the minimum setting so the pipes don't freeze.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help in a different way:
• If you don't want to contribute you don't have to, just pray for me.  I could use a good prayer, not a laugh.

• If you know a place in my area, whose employees rock when it comes to these car problems. Let me know please.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Than you so much for at least reading some of my History.

The Rundown

Hello friends,

My mother, Victoria, is the most selfless and loving person I know. She has gone above and beyond for everyone, whether it be organizing fundraisers for those suffering with cancer to throwing countless birthday parties to shipping my most beloved pet, books and American comforts to mewhen I lived abroad. My mother always puts others before herself, and goes above and beyond to help make everyone else's life easier. She's endured much abuse and suffering, and has turned out all the more loving and nurturing. Her heart is unfathomly big, and all who meet her love her.

In the midst of our crazy lives, my mom was diagnosed with cancer, yet felt it would burden my family too much to tell us about it. Just recently finding out, we're naturally sad, upset, and worried.

Surgeries have been suggested, but we're looking into antineoplaston therapy at the Burzynski Clinic in Houston, TX. Additionally, we've begun a raw, vegan diet and raw juice cleansing as well to help detox her body.

Please consider donating to her medical fund. We're not sure what lay ahead, but we know it won't be easy or inexpensive, and I really need help covering all the bases. I need her around. She's the person I love most in this world.

Thank you for reading,

Kalyn, Victoria's daughter

Where the Funds Go:

• I'm looking to raise $25,000 for her treatment. It may cost more but I'm trying to have a realistic goal.

  • Consultation fee at the Burzynski Clinic: $1,250

column4: >Deposit to Begin Therapy: $13,500- This deposit will be used for outpatient medical services and genetic blood work at the Burzynski Clinic

>

Medications: Unknown at this time. The medical team will determine the medications for the treatment plan after the consultation.

column1: • After being discharged: Case management per month is $4,500

• I don't want to lose my mother to something like this. She means everything to me, and I truly need help taking care of her. 
  • We've raised thousands in the past for friends with cancer and their families, and now we need your help.
  • I will be updating everyone as to her medical status as often as we see progress.
• We're super overwhelmed with bills from her conventional medical treatment, and I know stress has been a huge factor that has caused her illness.
• Please share our page if you're able/unable to donate, as we need as much support as we can get. Please also use the Indiegogo! share tools :)

Short Summary

The Cullowhee Chimeras are a community team located in Cullowhee, North Carolina. This is our second year as a team, and we are comprised almost entirely out of students from Western Carolina University.

During our first year as a team, we managed to place 4th in the Carolina Quidditch Conference, and 4th in the championship tournament. We finished the season with an official record of 5-1, and finished the championship tournament with an overall record of 8-4. 

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

The entirety of our funds will go to pay for jerseys, tournaments, and replacement equipment when needed. Any extra funds we collect would be used for merchandise that we can sell.

column1:
What are the rewards for donating? 
There are many incentives to donate. Some of the rewards include signed pictures of the team, thank you cards, custom scarves and beard-hats, survival bracelets, t-shirts with the Chimeras' logo on it, and much more to come!

The Impact

The players on the Chimeras aren't just a team, we're a family. We look out for each other, and we support each other. So when you donate, you aren't just sponsoring a team, you're sponsoring a family. You're sponsoring a sense of community that some people have never felt before. You're sponsoring memories that will last for years to come.
Our campaign last year was very successful, and this year, we'd like to do even better. That's where you come in. Every little bit helps.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't make a monetary contribution, but that doesn't mean you can't help. Other things you can do might include:
• Sharing our campaign with your family, friends, and acquaintances.
• Like our Facebook page and share it.
• Donate goods that we can sell or use

• Visit our PearUp page before December 12 and complete the tasks. It's completely free and costs nothing but a few minutes!
    https://www.pearup.com/chimeras/rally

SkyAngels International Rescue Calling.....
A new fundraising programme to enable SkyAngels to fly worldwide helping others when no one else will or can.
Free from political, religious and most importantly commercial considerations we wish to operate an international air ambulance &
column2: rescue foundation with our own fleet of aircraft and helicopters. Help us to save money on our aircraft charter costs and give us the freedom to make instant life saving decisions.

column1: We prefer to fly for free if possible or if we have too we only charge the direct operating costs.....no mark-up or profit is added. We believe every person should have the chance of a life saving flight or even a last flight home to be with their families when all else fails and they need to be with their family in their last hours.

On Indiegogo every week you will see people trying to raise money for life-saving or life-enhancing flights. SkyAngels will offer these people and others worldwide a free or non-profit emergency flight on a dedicated air ambulance jet.

We also offer highly qualified medical crews for escort missions on airlines for those patients that do not require a dedicated air ambulance jet. We have operational contacts with over 90% of the worlds airlines and airports.

When an aeromedical flight request is received by our emergency operations room we ask for all the medical facts, contact the patients doctors, contact the receiving hospital and with due diligence cover all aspects of the flight request. SkyAngels offer a full international bed-bed service. Please see our list of missions we have been asked to complete in the last few weeks!


FacesforAngels:

<span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate"">
Become a Faces4Angels Patron today and have a photo of your face on our jet!
This photo could be of either you, a family member or a lost loved one, flying with us every day. Your face on our jet, helping others. We hope you like the idea and become one of our Faces4Angels.
We estimate that we could have 60,000 Faces4Angels photos on each Jet and we need more than one aircraft to complete the missions we are being asked to do every week.

Your photo will also be on our website and show that you are a Faces4Angels Patron or even a Patron Jet Shareholder. You will be able to write a short message to go with your photo on our website making it even more personal.

Plus we can link this to your website, Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites.
Your Faces4Angels photo will enable us too..

Purchase outright a jet that will be a pre-owned example that can easily be converted into a air ambulance jet. The Gulfstream G111 could carry up to four stretcher's, infant incubators and a full emergency equipment fit, which would make these Flying Hospitals very very rare. We also like to fly with some family members on board if mission fit allows.

We require 3 aircraft immediately subject to funding. Estimate required for all 3 jets is in the region of $3M+. This campaign is for the first jet but if you like it we will carry on to purchase the 3 aircraft we require. Estimated operating costs of 3 jets worldwide is $6M. This Indiegogo campaign is just the start of our fundraising efforts to provide this vital service.

Jet Bases:

One jet based in USA for North &
column2: South American missions. SkyAngels is a full international member of the Air Care Alliance in America. This aircraft will be operated on a non-profit community public benefit flying basis when not required for international emergency missions:

column1: One jet based in England for Pan European missions. This aircraft will be operated on a non-profit NHS basis throughout Europe when not required for international emergency missions:

One jet based in South East Asia for Pan Asian missions. This aircraft will be operated on a non-profit international charity basis throughout the region when not required for international emergency missions: Charities supported by SkyAngels include the International Red Cross and Red Crescent:

Due to our trans-continental aeromedical flights we wish to purchase a model in the Gulfstream Jet range. This aircraft a Gulfstream G111 would enable us to fly non-stop Heathrow-New York for instance. Interior fit one-four stretchers with full medevac equipment.

We hope to purchase outright these jet aircraft thereby saving interest rates and further finance costs.

However if we do not reach the campaign total, we will use the amount raised and place it down as an aircraft deposit and lease the Gulfstream G3 aircraft (subject to finance approval and the amount raised): At the very least we will place your fantastic family photos onto our existing emergency response vehicles with a vehicle wrap.
An typical aircraft leasing deal could cost us:-

Finance on a $1M+ jet would equal $22,000+ per month: $264,000 year, which of course equates to over $2,640,000 over the 10 years. Nearly 3 times as much as an outright purchase....hence our campaign.
Purchasing the jet outright would save us over hundreds of thousands of dollars over 10 years on the cost of the aircraft.
SkyAngels International Rescue is contacted every week to provide medical flights. We could be operating 10-20 every month by 2014 with your help across the world!

Missions we have been asked to complete over the last few weeks, all at no charge for the family and patient:

Syracuse Hancock International Airport USA - Jacksonville International Airport USA
Lagos International Airport Nigeria - Heathrow International Airport England
Los Angeles Airport USA - Munich International Airport Germany
Rafik Hariri International Airport Lebanon - Philadelphia International Airport USA
Minneapolis St Pauls Airport USA - San Salvador Airport Bahamas
Odessa International Airport Ukraine - Philadelphia International Airport USA
L.F Wade International Airport Bermuda - San Diego International Airport USA

Every time we complete a mission your name will be listed and linked to your photo on our website. Plus we can link this to your website, Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites.

We are SkyAngels International Rescue:
We are a international non-profit air ambulance &
column2: rescue foundation. Our personnel are all highly skilled pilots, aeromedical paramedics and doctors. We have crews based all around the world from America, Asia, Africa and Europe all waiting to fly to help others.

column1: At the present time we charter aircraft and helicopter for these missions, however the costs can be extremely high and availability uncertain. By purchasing our own fleet we will be able to save more lives and enhance many more.

SkyAngels operates one of the worlds most advanced emergency response software programmes which allows our personnel to operate worldwide with email, SMS, real time messaging and the tracking of equipment.
We have one aim...to enhance, protect and save life whenever and however we can.
